i81b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// nang stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid las gud na yang shes
i81b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhini nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa med do// nang stong
i81b7('bum): pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu byi nang pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu pi nang pa myed do// phyi stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin
i81b8('bum): phyi stong pa nyidang las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang ba ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab
i82a1('bum): chom du byi na pa mang / byi nang snang ba nyid kyang shes rab kyipa'i mang du phyin dpa ma yin// phyi nang sre ga nid las gung nasang shes rab ky-is mdu na dad pa sru dang / nang spang pa'i kyi pa
i82a2('bum): kyang shes rab kyi bar/ lang du phyin drab ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin 'dra las gud na yung shes rab kyi pha rolang tu'i nang pa myed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa
i82a3('bum): yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha ro ldang tu phyi nang pa myed de/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi gung na yang
i82a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// 
i82a5('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes patshe rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang po myed do// chen po stong pa nyid kyang shes rab
i82a6('bum): kyi bu rol tu phyi nad pa ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi thar mod tu phyind pa med do/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ma yin/ chen po stong
i82a7('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu mi nad pa myed do// chen po stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gung
i82a8('bum): yang shes rab kyi pa so kyi dang pa myed / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang nis rab kyi sang tu rje nga ba ma yin/ don dam pa steng pa'ing lamo gung du yang shes rab kyi pa 'i lang du phyi nga pa med do// da
i82b1('bum): bstong panyid kyi bzhi cing / shes rab kyi pa'i bang du phyin pa ma yin// de ngam pa stong panyid kyi de bzhin ning pas gu na yang shes rab kyis mang du phyin pa myed do// don dam bstong pa nyid kyi chos nyi
i82b2('bum): 'a kya pa mang du brnyed pa ma yin// den dam pa stong panyid kyi chos nyid las gung na lang gas ra kyi pa phred tu pa nang pa med de/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kying shes rab kyi ro rol du du bdang pa ma yin/ lu
i82b3('bum): song pa'i las gu na yang shes rab kyi ba bang du byi nang pa ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa'i dpyi ngazhini dkyang shes rab kyi bar ba du nang bum sa na/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi dbezhin nyi sas gung du
i82b4('bum): rab kyi rol du phyinang pa myed do/ 'dus byas stong panyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu bri nang pa ma yin/ 'dus byas sring panyid kyi chos nyid las gung na yang shes rab kyi pa ro lang du 'i nang pa myed/ 
i82b5('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa med do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes
i82b6('bum): rab kyi pha ro lang du phyin pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bezhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa myed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyinang pa
i82b7('bum): ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phand pa myed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong/ 
i82b8('bum): ba nyid yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi rang ba myed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyi nad pa ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gu da
i83a1('bum): snang shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyi nad pa myed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi nad pa ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes ra
i83a2('bum): pa re bad du phyi nad pa ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma myong ba stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyi nad pa ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa'ing las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyind pa med do// thog ma
i83a3('bum): tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ma yin khrag mo dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// theg ma dang tha ma med
i83a4('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyind pa med do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang shes rab
i83a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa med do// der ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ dor ba med
i83a6('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi rang ba myed do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyind pa ma yin/ dir ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gu
i83a7('bum): na yang shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyi nad pa meng ngo sa su mye ma sa shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyi nang pa meng ngo // rang bzhin stong ba nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phye nang pa ma srin
i83a8('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab ka par yang du band pa med de/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha long du phyi rang pa ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid
i83b1('bum): las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha ro yid tu phyind pa ma yin// chos thams cad stong pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa med do// 
i83b2('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// chos thams cad stong pa
i83b3('bum): nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
i83b4('bum): phra ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa med do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
i83b5('bum): kyi de ba'i na nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa med // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin de pa ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang
i83b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// mi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa ma yin/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyinang pa myed do// myi dmyigs
i83b7('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha ro lang du ba nad pa ma yin/ myi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang / shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyinang pa myed do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi chos
i83b8('bum): nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyind pa ma yin/ myi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha ro sang tu phyi nang pa med do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
i84a1('bum): ma yin/ dngos po med pa snang pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha ro lad tu phra nang pa myed do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha lang du phyind pa ma yin
i84a2('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lus gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa med de/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa ma yin/ dngos du myed
i84a3('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi ches nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha ro ltad tu phyind pa myed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi dpa
i84a4('bum): ro lang tu phyind pa myed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// 
i84a5('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gu nga na yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
i84a6('bum): nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa ma yin/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin du pa myed do// dngos po myed po'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kya
i84a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de ba'i ni nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa myed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid steng pa nyid
i84a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu bri nang pa ma yin/ dngos po myong ba'i ngo bo nyid stong ba nyid kyi chos nyid las gad+hAn ye shes rab kyi ba ri mang du phyi nang pa ma yin/ dran pa'i bar gnag pa rnams kyang shes rab
i84b1('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa'i ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang
i84b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab
i84b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mye/ do// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
i84b4('bum): pa ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa myed do// yang dag par song ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ yang dag
i84b5('bum): bar spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do yang dag par song ba rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ma yin/ yang dag
i84b6('bum): spong ba rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyind pa med do// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams las su
i84b7('bum): na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na nga
i84b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha ro yang du lhanang pa tshong / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang / shes
i85a1('bum): rab kyi pha ro sang du phyin pa myed du/ dbang po rnams kyang nas rab kyi pha bang tu na pa ma yin/ dbang pon rjes las gud na yang nas rab kyi pa ri yang du nang pa ma yin/ dbang po rnams kyi
i85a2('bum): bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ma yin/ dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha ro lang du pi nang pa med do// dbang po rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pa rang
i85a3('bum): tu phyi rang pa ma yin/ dbang po rnams kyi chos nyid las gung na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa med do// stobs rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ma yin/ stobs rnams las
i85a4('bum): gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab
i85a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa myed do// stobs rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyind pa ma yin/ stobs rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa myed do// byang
i85a6('bum): chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang shes rab kyi pa bang tu byi nad pa ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams las gung na yang shes rab kyi pa lung tu phyind pa myedang/ byang chub kyi yan la grwa rnams kyi
i85a7('bum): bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha mang du mi nung pa ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi nang pa myed de/ byang chub kyi yan log
i85a8('bum): rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha ri sad du byi nad pa med do// 'phags pa'i pha
i85b1('bum): ngams gyes da kyi ya du myed pa ma yin/ lags pa mam yan 'ag rgyang byags gra nas shes sa b+hi dang / gas ma ldan
i85b2('bum): pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha'o yong du byen pa ma smin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de ba'i na nyid las gung na yang zhes rab kau par yang tu byi nang pa myed nga/ 'bags pal
i85b3('bum): yan lag brgyad pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha ro leng tu phyi nang pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yang lag brgyad ba'i chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyi nang pa myed do// 'phags
i85b4('bum): pa'i bden pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang
i85b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa myed do// 'phags pa'i bde canA gi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha
i85b6('bum): rol du phyind pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha ro lad tu phyi nad pa myed do// ngas tan rnams kya shes pa kyi pha du phyin
i85b7('bum): ba'i bang pa rnams kyi chos nyid lngas kung na yang shes bang du bsam gtan rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyinang bra ma yin/ bsam gtan rnams
i85b8('bum): las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nang pa med do// bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi phyi ra lang du phyind pa ma yin/ bsam gtan ga de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes
i86a1('bum): rab kyi pha rolang du phyi nang pa myed de/ bsam gtan rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi rang pa ma yin/ bsam gtan rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rolang du phying
i86a2('bum): pa myed do// tshad myed pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa ma yin/ tshad myed pa rnams las grong ni yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi nang pa myed do// tshad myed pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes
i86a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ma yin/ tshad myed pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa med do// tshad myed pa rnams kyi ches nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa ma yin/ tshad
i86a4('bum): myed pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rolo tu phyind pa ma yin/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa/ 
i86a5('bum): rnams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa med do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
i86a6('bum): rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha ldad tu phyind pa myed do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
i86a7('bum): ngar 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyidad pa myed do// rnam par tha rad pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams las gud na yang shes rab kyi
i86a8('bum): rol tu pi nad pa myed ngo // rnam par tha rad pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha ro lang du phyi rang ba ma yin/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyinang pa mang
i86b1('bum): rno bar tha rang pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ma yin/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa myed do// mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
i86b2('bum): rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa myed do// mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi
i86b3('bum): de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa ma yin/ mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhini nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms
i86b4('bum): par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ma yin/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa myed do// rnam par thar
i86b5('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
i86b6('bum): pa myed do// rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ma yin/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa'i
i86b7('bum): de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// rnam por tha rang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshar ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyinang pa ma yin/ rim por thang
i86b8('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa'i chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa myeng ngo // mngon par shes pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa ma yin/ mngon par shes pa
i87a1('bum): rnams sa grang na pa gas ra kyi mang du phyi pa byangadang / mngon pa shes pa rnams kyi bzhin nyi kyi shes bkyi pa ra tu na pas san/ mngon par shes pa rnam kyid sbyi smra
i87a2('bum): yang shes rab kyi pha re lang du phyind pa myed do// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi chos nyid lus gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyi nang pa
i87a3('bum): myed do// ting nge 'dzinang rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ma yin/ ting nge 'dzind rnams las gu de ni yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// ting nge 'dzinang rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi
i87a4('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ ting nge 'dzind rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo
i87a5('bum): rnams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// gzungs sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de ba zhin nyid las gud na yang she
i87a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyi nang pa ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa myed do/ 
i87a7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i so bros rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyird pa ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa med do// de bzhin gshegs pas
i87a8('bum): stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha ro lang du 'i rang ba ma min/ ri ba'i ragashegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gung na yang shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyind pa myed do// de bzhin
i87b1('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ de ba'i rwa gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// de bzhin
i87b2('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa myed do// myi 'jig
i87b3('bum): pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ myi 'jigs pa rnams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
i87b4('bum): phyi nad pa ma yin/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nud pa ma yin/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyind pa ma yin/ myi 'jig
i87b5('bum): pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa myed do// so so yang dag par rig/ ba rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams las
i87b6('bum): gud ni yang shes rab kyi pha lang tu phyind pa myed do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin
i87b7('bum): da las gung na yang shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu band pa myed do// sos yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi chos nyid krung shes rab kyi pha ro long tu phyi nang pa ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi tshi
i87b8('bum): nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi ba rol tu phyi nang pa myong ngo / byams pa chen po yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ma yin/ byams pa chen po las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa med
i88a1('bum): byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ byams pa chen po'i dri bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// byams pa chen po'i chos nyid
i88a2('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ma yin/ byams pa chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa med do// snying rje chen po yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ snying rje chen po las gud
i88a3('bum): na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang ba myed do// snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyinang pa myed // snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed de/ 
i88a4('bum): snying rje chen po'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol dutu phyi nang pa ma yin/ snying rje chen po'i chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi rang ba myed de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi
i88a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid
i88a6('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pa ro nga tu phyind pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin 'ad las gung na yang shes rab kyi po ril du kyi ni nang po myed de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pangs
i88a7('bum): kyi chos nyid kyang shos rab kyi pha'i mang tu phyi na pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi rnaMs ma 'dres par mus kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha ro slong du byin nga pa med do// rnams cad shes pa nyid kya shes
i88a8('bum): rab kyi pa lad tu bri rang ba ma yid/ thams cad shes pa nyid las gung ni yang shes rab kyi pha ro lang du 'i nang ba med do// thams cad shes pa nyid kyi de ba'on nyid kang gis rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin
i88b1('bum): ma gas pa pa ga cad kyas krung mam mas klu byam pa nga/ rnams ngas da kya sa kyi mdu su na/ mapa
i88b2('bum): chos nyid las gud na sang shes rab kyi pha mang tu na pa med de/ bram gri nem pa shes pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pa mang tu phrin pa ma yin/ sam gri nom pa shes pa nyid las gud na ma nas
i88b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ lam gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab
i88b4('bum): kye pha rold tu phyind pa myed do// lam gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid kang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ma yin/ lam gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol
i88b5('bum): tu phyinang pa myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do/ 
i88b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha lang tu phyi dang po ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye na pa nyid kyi de bezhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha romang tu phyind pa
i88b7('bum): myeng ngo // rnam pa thams cad ma nang pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi par lang du byi na pa ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi bA ro srong du byi nad pa myed do// 
i88b8('bum): dam po bdun pa'o// // de ci'i phyir zhen/ ke'u shi ka di ni 'di ltar chos de dag thams cad myed cing myi dmigs pa ste/ de la
i89a1('bum): chos thams cad myed cing myi dmyigs pas/ gzugs kyang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ma yin/ gzugs las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid
i89a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa med do// gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa ma yin/ gzugs
i89a3('bum): kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyi nad pa myed do// tshor ba yang shes rab kyi pha re lang tu phyind pa ma yin/ tshor ba las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa med do// rlung
i89a4('bum): ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa ma yin/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa myed do// tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
i89a5('bum): pa ma yin/ tshor ba'i chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed do// 'du shes kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ 'du shes las gud rgyan yang shes rab kyi pha
i89a6('bum): rol tu phyind pa med do// 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha ri mang du phyi nang pa ma yin/ 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid las gung na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa med do// 
i89a7('bum): shes kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa ma yin/ 'du shes kyi chos nyid lngas gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa med do// 'du byed kyang shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyi nang pa ma
i89a8('bum): yin/ 'du byed las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha ro rtsa lang tu phyind pa med do// 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang
i89b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa med do// 'du byed kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 'du byed kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa mye/ da // rnam par shes
i89b2('bum): pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyinang pa med do// rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes / rab kyi pha rol tu
i89b3('bum): phyi nang pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ rnam par
i89b4('bum): shes pa'i chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa med do// myig kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ma yin/ myig las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha lod tu phyind pa myed do// 
i89b5('bum): myig gi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi nang pa ma yin/ mig gi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyinang pa med do// myig gi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
i89b6('bum): byi nang pa ma yin/ mig gi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myong ngo // rna ba yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi nang pa ma yin/ rna ba las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
i89b7('bum): phyi nunang pa myed do// rna ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ma yin/ rna ba'i de bzhin nyid las gud na ye shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa myang ngo // rna ba'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi
i89b8('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ rna ba'i chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu pha radang pa med do// sA yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin no// sA las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol
i90a1('bum): tu phyi rang ba myed do// sna'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ sA'i de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// sna'i chos nyid kyang shes rab
i90a2('bum): kyi pha lod tu phyi nang pa ma yin/ sna'i chos nyid lasu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa med do// lce yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ lce las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa med
i90a3('bum): de/ lce'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ma yin/ lce'i de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi rad pa myed do// lho'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
i90a4('bum): pa ma yin/ lce'i chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// lus kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ lus las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa
i90a5('bum): myed do// lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa ma yin/ lus kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa myed de/ lus kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha
i90a6('bum): rolang tu phyind pa ma yin/ lus kyi chos kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa med do// yid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin de ba ma yin/ yid las gud na yang shes
i90a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa myed de/ yid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa ma yin/ yid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa med de
i90a8('bum): yid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ yid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa myed do// gzugs kau shes rab kyi pha rol de daphyir
i90b1('bum): pa ma yin/ gzugs las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed de/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha re lang du phyi nad pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes
i90b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// sgra yang shes
i90b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ma yin/ sgra las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha lang tu phyi ring pa myed do// sgra'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha ro lang du byin pa ma yin/ sgra de bzhin nyid las gud na yang
i90b4('bum): shes rab kyi pa lang tu phyin pa myed do/ sgra'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha ro ying du phyi nang pa ma yin+da/ sgra'i chos nyid lngas gung na yang shes rab kyi pa'i lung du sbyinang pa myed do// dri yang shes rab tu
i90b5('bum): rol du phyinang pa ma yin/ drilas gung na yang shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyind pa myed do// dro de ba'in nyid kyang shes rab kyi pa ming kyi phyi nang pa ma yin/ dri nga badzin ning las gung na yang shes rab kyi
i90b6('bum): rol tu phyind pa myed do// dri'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rolang tu rnyed pa ma yin/ dri'i chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha lang tu phyi rang ba med do// rol pashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
i90b7('bum): yin/ rolas gung na yang shes rab kyi bu romang du mi nad pa myed do// 'di bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ ro'i de bzhin nyid las gung ma yang shes rab kyi pha rol de tu phyi'ang pa/ 
i90b8('bum): byed // re'i tshi nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha ro mang du phyi nang pa ma yin/ ro chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rolang tu byi nad pa myed de/ reg kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ 
i91a1('bum): las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do// reg gi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa ma yin/ reg gi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol
i91a2('bum): pa myed do// reg gi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ma yin/ reg gi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi na pa ma yin/ chos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ma yod
i91a3('bum): chos las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa myed do// chos kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa ma yin/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa
i91a4('bum): myed do// chos kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyinang pa ma yin/ chos kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do// myig gi rnam par shes pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol
i91a5('bum): kud+hi nang pa ma yin/ myig gi rnam par shes pa las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyi nang pa myed do// myig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa ma yin/ myig gi nam
i91a6('bum): badzinas pa'i de bzhin ning las grung na yang shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyin pa myed do// myig gi rnam par thos pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pa'i mid du phyind pa ma yin/ mig gi nam par shes pa'i chos
i91a7('bum): nyid ltas gdun yang shes rab kyi pha rolang du yi nad pa med do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ na ba'i rnam par shes pa las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol
i91a8('bum): bya'ang pa med de/ na ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha ro bang du ciringadra ba ma yid/ na pa'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gung na me shes rab kyi pha'i lang du byan
i91b1('bum): bamyed // na pa rnam par shes pa 'chas 'dang kyang shes rab kyipa yang du phyin pa ma yin/ na ba'i rnam pa mags pa'i chos nyid las gud na la shes rab kyi pha rol du du phyin pa byed do/ sku'i rnam pa shes pa sa
i91b2('bum): gos kyi roladu du sbyin pa myed do/ gA'i rnam par shes palas gud na yang shes ba kyi pa sa du yin pagyid do// sa'i rnam pa rigs pa'i di bzhin ny-i kya shes rab kyi lang du 'i nang pa mthun/ 'i
i91b3('bum): rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha de meng tu byi nad pa myed do// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i chos ni
i91b4('bum): las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed de/ lce'i rnam par shes pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ lce'i rnam par shes pa las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
i91b5('bum): pa myed do// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa ma yin/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed do// lho'i rna
i91b6('bum): bar shes pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ma yin/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// lus kyi rnam par shos pa yang shes
i91b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa ma yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du byind pa myang ngo // lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa ma
i91b8('bum): yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin 'dadi las gung na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu band pa myed do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha ro lang du phyind pa ma yin/ lus kyi
i92a1('bum): par shes pa'i ches nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha ral tu phyind pa med de/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ma yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa las gud na yang shes rab kyi
i92a2('bum): rolang tu phyin pa myong ngo // yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyi nang pa ma yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med de/ yid
i92a3('bum): rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa'i yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa myed do// myig gyi 'dus te reg pa'i shes rab kyi pha ro lang du
i92a4('bum): phyin pa ma yin/ myig kyi 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyi nang pa myed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi nang pa ma yin/ myig gi 'dus te reg
i92a5('bum): pi'i de bzhini 'ang las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyi nang pa meng ngo // mig gi 'dus te rig pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha ro sang tu phyi rang ba ma yin/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid las gud na yang shes
i92a6('bum): rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa med do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyind pa med do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg
i92a7('bum): pa'i dri bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyi nang pa ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de ba'i nanyid las gung na yang shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu po rang ba myed do// rdza ba'i 'dus te rig pa'i chos cid kyang shes rabri kI par long
i92a8('bum): phyi nga pa ma yod/ na ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid las gung na yang gis rab kyi phang du phyi nad pa byed nga/ sna'i 'dus de rig pa sa gis rab kyi ro lang du mi rang po ma yir/ sI'i 'dus te reg pa 'de bzhin
i92b1('bum): ma med do// lce'i 'dus pa reg pa yang shes rab kyi nga ro bang tu phyi nang pa ma yin/ lcong 'alus te reg pa las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa myed do// lce'i 'dus te rig pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang ge
i92b2('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du tu phyind pa med do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nang pa ma yin/ glo 'dus
i92b3('bum): te reg pa'i chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa med do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha roldad du
i92b4('bum): phyi nang pa myed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ lus kyi
i92b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang shes rab kyi pha rolang
i92b6('bum): tu phyinang pa ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te rig pa'i gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// yid kyi 'dus de reg pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang ba ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg bla'i
i92b7('bum): ba'i nanyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nong pa med do// yid kyi 'dus te rig pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha ro long du phyind pa ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid las gud na ya shes rab kyi
i93a1('bum): ro lang tu phyi nang pa myed do/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ te/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rold du phyin
i93a2('bum): pa myed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyerd kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyi nang pa ma yin/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rolang
i93a3('bum): tuphyi nang pa myed do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyinang rtsapa ma yin/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha ra
i93a4('bum): tu phyi rad pa med do// rna ba ni 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i nyend kyis tshor ba las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa med do// 
i93a5('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i nye nad kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed do/ 
i93a6('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid las gung na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi rang pa myed do// sI'i 'dus
i93a7('bum): te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyin pa ma yin/ sI'i 'dus te reg pa'i te nad kyis tshor ba las gung na yang shes rab kyi pha ro mang du phyinang ba myed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis cher tshe
i93a8('bum): de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i nye rad kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nying gung na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa myong ngo // sna'i 'dus de reg pa'i rkyend kyis cho
i93b1('bum): chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol pa du phyinang pa ma yin/ gA'i 'dus te rig pa'i chend kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rolang du yi nang pa med do// khre'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma
i93b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha
i93b3('bum): re lang tu phyinang pa ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol
i93b4('bum): tu phyi nang pa ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa yin
i93b5('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ lus kyi
i93b6('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa myed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ lus kyi
i93b7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa myed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor badz+ra shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ yid kyi 'das
i93b8('bum): te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa med do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus
i94a1('bum): de rig pa'i rkyenang kyis tshor ba'i dra bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyang yang tu phyinang pa med do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i nad kyis char ba'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha lang tu phyi nang pa mtshar
i94a2('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed nga / sa'i khams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa ma yin+da/ sa'i khams las gud na yang shes
i94a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa med do/ sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ma yon/ sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid las gung ra yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// sa'i khas
i94a4('bum): kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang ba ma yin/ sa'i khams kyi chos nyid las gung na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa med do// chu'i khams kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa ma yin/ 
i94a5('bum): tshu khams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha ro song tu phyinang pa med do// chu khams kyi de ba'i naring kyang shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyi nad pa ma yin/ tshung khams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi
i94a6('bum): mang du na pa ma yin/ chu'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi da'o bang du phyin pa ma yid/ chu khams sde sa nyid bus gu na yang shes rab kyi pa rlo mang byin du pa med de/ myi'i khams kyang shes pa
i94a7('bum): kyiba'i ming tu dang pa ma mer/ chu'i khams lapas grang na yang shes rab stonga'i yang du nad pa med do/ mye'i khams kyi de bezhin nyid kyang shes rabakri pa ming tu phyi nong pa ma yin/ n+ya'i khams kyi
i94a8('bum): bzhin nyid las gung na yang zhes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyinang pa med do// me'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyi nang pa ma yin/ myi'i khams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
i94b1('bum): phyinang pa myed do// rlung gA khams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa ma yin/ rlung ba khams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha re lang tu phyinang pa med do// rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi
i94b2('bum): rolang tu phyind pa ma yin/ rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin 'anyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du tu phyind pa myed do// rlung gi khams kyi chos nyid kying shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa ma yin/ 
i94b3('bum): rlung kyi khams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// nam mkha'i khams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ nam mkha'i khams las gud na yang shes
i94b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa med do// nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa ma yin/ nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
i94b5('bum): pa myed do// nam mkha'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi rang pa ma yin/ nam mkha'i khams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa myed do// rnam par
i94b6('bum): shes pa'i khams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin
i94b7('bum): nyid kyang shes ba kyi sod tu bye nad pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin med pas gu na yang shes rab kyi pha ro yang du bye nad pa med do// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi chas
i94b8('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa myed do// ma rig pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma
i95a1('bum): yun dam rig pa las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyi nang pa med du/ ma rig bya'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha re lang tu phyi nang pa ma yin/ ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud nam
i95a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyinang pa myed do// ma rig pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha re la tu phyi nang pa ma yin no/ ma rig pa'i chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab tupha rol du phyin pa mad
i95a3('bum): 'du byed kyang shes rab kyi pha ri la tu phyind pa ma yin/ 'du byed las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha re lang tu phyin sa pa myed do// 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi nad pa ma yin/ 
i95a4('bum): 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha ri lad tu phyind pa myed do// 'du byed kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nadang pa ma yin/ 'du byed kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes
i95a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do/ rnam par shes pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha lang tu phyinang pa med do// rnam par
i95a6('bum): shes pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid mas gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyi nad pa myed do// ming dang gzugs kyang shes rab kyi pha rol
i95a7('bum): tu phyi rang bra ma yin/ ming dang gzugs las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa med de/ mying dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu banang pa ma yin/ mying dang gzugs
i95a8('bum): de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha yang du phyi nad pa med do// mying dang gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rolang tu mnad pa ma yin/ mying dang gzugs kyi chos nyid las gud na yang zhes
i95a9('bum): de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnaM bar she ba'i de bzhin 'di las gung na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa me
i95b1('bum): kyi sa cho mang tu phyin pa med do// skye mched drug kyang shes rab kyi pa lang tu phyid pa ma yin/ skye mchid drug las gung na yang shes rab kyi pha rolang tu nang pa myed do// skye mched drug gli bzhin nyid kyang shes
i95b2('bum): rab kyi pha rolang tu phyinang pa ma yin/ skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rolang tu byi nad pa myed de/ skye mched drug gi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha ro lod tu 'i nang pa ma yin/ skye
i95b3('bum): mched drug gi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa med de/ reg pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ reg pa las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// reg
i95b4('bum): pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ reg pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed do// reg pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
i95b5('bum): pa ma yin/ reg pa'i chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa med do// tshor ba yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa ma yin/ tshor ba las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol de tu
i95b6('bum): pamyed do// tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol
i95b7('bum): tu phyind pa ma yin no// tshor ba'i chos nyid lngas gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// srang ba yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ sred pa las gu dra na yang shes rab kyi pha rol
i95b8('bum): tu byin pa med do// sred pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa ma yin/ srid pa'i de bzhin nyid las gung na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// sred pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab
i96a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ sred pa'i chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa med do// len pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ len pa las gu de na yang shes rab tu
i96a2('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// nang pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa ma yin/ lend pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi rang pa myed do// le nad pa'i chos nyid
i96a3('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ le nad pa'i chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa med do// len pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed
i96a4('bum): chos nyid las gang na yang shes srid pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ 
i96a5('bum): srid pa las gud na sang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa meng do// srid pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyi rang ba ma yid/ srong pa'i de bzhini 'ang las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha yid tu byin pa myed do/ 
i96a6('bum): srid pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha ro lang du phyi ba ma yin/ srid pa'i chos nyid las gung na yang shes das kyi pha'i ling du phyin pa myed do// sme ba ya shes rapa
i96a7('bum): du kyid bus 'im/ thos dab kyi pa mang byas pa myed de/ zla ba de bzhin kyi shes ba pa mang du phyind pam min+ta/ smye 'ang ba'i ma rnalas smad ra pa gas
i96a8('bum): rolang kyi byir du nga / gyi'i mas bkri'i yang gyis mngon/ slob sa nyid las grang na ya shes kyi ma 'o mang kyi nang pa byed de/ gshe yang gas rab kyi pha romang du gyis
i96b1('bum): ma yin/ rga shi las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed do// rga shi'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ rga shi'i de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol da tu
i96b2('bum): phyi nad pa med do// rga shi'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ rga shi'i chos nyid las gud na yid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa med do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang shes rab kyi
i96b3('bum): pha rol tu phyi nang pa ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa myed do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma
i96b4('bum): yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhi ni nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// sbyin pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
i96b5('bum): pa'i chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las gud na yod
i96b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa med do// tshul khrims kyi pha rolang du phyi nang pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud
i96b7('bum): na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi rad pa myed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu byind pa'i chos nyid las gung
i97a1('bum): na yang shes rab kyi pha rolang du pha rang ba myed do// bzed pa'i pha rol du tu nang ba yang shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu pi rang ba ma yin/ bzang ba'i pha rol tu pa rang ba las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha ro la
i97a2('bum): phyinang pa myed do// 'azong ba'i pha rol tu phyi rang ba'i nga bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyi nad pa ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha ro lang tu phyi nang pa'i de bzhin 'di las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa med de
i97a3('bum): thong po'ing yong tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha yang du phyi rang pa'i mim/ bzong po'i pha robang tu mi nang pa'i chos nyid las gung ra yang shes rab kyi pi ro leng tu byi nad pa med do// btsan 'grus kyi po
i97a4('bum): chu phyi nang pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol du po dang pa ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du pi nang pa las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa med do// brtson 'grus kyi pha lang du phyinang pa'i de bzhin ning
i97a5('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rolang du pi nang po ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rolo tu phyinang pa med de/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rolang du par
i97a6('bum): de'i chos nyid kyi shes rab kyi pa ra ldang pa ma yon/ btsun 'grus kyi pha rol de du ba rang po'i chos ning las gang ma yang shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu nod pa meng de/ bsam gtan ga pa rolang du po nang pa la
i97a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol du mi nad pa ma'in/ bsam gtan gri pa ri lang du pi rang pA lis gung na sa shes k+Shi pha ro lang du phyi mad pa myed do// bsam gtan gyi pa
i97a8('bum): tu byin pa 'di bzhin sa kyai/ shAs mya gtan gi pha rol tu'i nang pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol de tu phyi na pa med de/ bsam gtan gi
i97b1('bum): rolang tu phyind pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyind pa'i chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu ji
i97b2('bum): pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma/ yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa med do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi
i97b3('bum): pha rold tu phyind pa ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol
i97b4('bum): tu phyind pa ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa med do// nang stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ nang stong pa

i97b6('bum): rol tu phyind pa med do// nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid kyi gud+hA nA yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// phyi spong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi
i97b7('bum): pha rol tu phyi nang pa ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa myed do// phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid
i97b8('bum): de bzhini 'ad las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi rang ba med do// phyi stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kang shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyi nang pa ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab
i98a1('bum): rol tu phyi nang pa med do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang ba ma yin no// phyi nang stong pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa mad // phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin
i98a2('bum): nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rolang tu 'i nad pa ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin 'o mas gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa myed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha lang tu
i98a3('bum): byi nad pa ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu pi nang pa myed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid las
i98a4('bum): gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa myed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nadang pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab
i98a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyi rang ba ma yin/ stong pa nyid snang ba nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa med pa
i98a6('bum): non pa stong pa nyid kyang gis rab kyi pha ro lang du phyin pa ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid las gud ni yang shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyi rang ba med do/ chen pa stong pa nyid kyi ba'an nyid kyang shes rab kyi phyir ma
i98a7('bum): byirnyed pa ma yin/ cheran po stong pa nyid kyi de ba'on 'di las gung ra yang shes rab kyi par slong du pi rang med de/ chen po stong banyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pa mang du nang pa ma yin/ chen po stong
i98a8('bum): kyi chos 'ing las grang ra yang shes rab kyi par lang du kyid pa med de/ dor dam po song pa nyid kyi shes kyi la rol tu zin pa ma dzem/ de rangam pa spong ba'id las gung na yang shes rab kyi pha ro ma
i98b1('bum): phyi nang pa myed do// den dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi nad pa ma yin// de na dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin 'di las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do// don du
i98b2('bum): stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa med do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha ro// da tu
i98b3('bum): phyirang pa ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kya
i98b4('bum): bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa myed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes
i98b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// 'dus ma ngas
i98b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa med do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyim
i98b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nang pa myed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi rang ba
i98b8('bum): ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid lngas gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi nad pa myed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ma
i99a1('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyi nang pa myed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha lang tu phyind pa ma yin
i99a2('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa med do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa
i99a3('bum): stong pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi rang ba ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi
i99a4('bum): de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa myed do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ theg ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi
i99a5('bum): chos nyid las gud ni yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyinang pa myed do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi rang ba ma yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol
i99a6('bum): tu phyind pa med do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa ma yin/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lngas gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du tu phyin
i99a7('bum): ba myod do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi ches nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa ma yin// der ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha ro la tu phyind pa myed do// rang bzhin sngang
i99a8('bum): pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma mos rang ba'i na stong pa nyidadi las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha lang du phyi nad pa med do// rang bzhidu stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyind pa myed // 
i99b1('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nying las gung na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi na pa myed do/ rang bzhir stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyi nad pa ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid
i99b2('bum): las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
i99b3('bum): meng / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// 
i99b4('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed do// rang gi mtshan
i99b5('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid las gung ra yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa med do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes ra
i99b6('bum): kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la sa gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa med do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin
i99b7('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa myed do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin// myi dmigs pa stong pa nyid las
i99b8('bum): gud na yang shes rab kyi pha ro mang du byi rang skyed ngo // mI dmyigs pa song pa nyid kyi dngor nyid kyang zhes rab kyi sa 'i mang tu rang pa ma hir/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi degatsu nga las gud na yang shes
i100a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa myed do// myi dmyags pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ myi dmyigs rab stong pa nyid la sgra gud na nga shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi nang pa myed de/ rangs
i100a2('bum): po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol
i100a3('bum): du phyi nad pa ma yin/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha ro lad tu phyi nang pa myed do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rolang du pi nad pa ma yin/ dngos
i100a4('bum): pa myed pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid ya shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
i100a5('bum): pa med do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyi nang pa ma yim ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa myed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa
i100a6('bum): kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed de/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du
i100a7('bum): phyi nang pa ma yin/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gung na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi nang pa ma yin/ dngos lnga
i100a8('bum): myed pa'i ngo sho stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gung na yang shes rab kyi sa lang du phyin pa med do// ngos po mang pa'i mo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos ri kyang gis rab kyi pa mang du pi pa ma yin/ dngos po myed pa
i100b1('bum): dro nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa mya dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams las gud na yang she
i100b2('bum): rab kyi pha ro lang du phyi nad pa myed do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa med
i100b3('bum): do/ dran panye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa myed do// yang dag
i100b4('bum): bar spong ba rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed de/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi nga bzhi ni nyid kyang shes
i100b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi
i100b6('bum): pha ro lang tu phyind pa ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinang pa ma yin
i100b7('bum): rdzu 'phrul gi rkang ba rnams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// rdzu 'phrul gau rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyi nad pa ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams/ 
i100b8('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa med // rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams kyi chos nyid las
i101a1('bum): gud nab+h+ya/ thes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi rang ba myed // dbang po rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin du dbang po rnams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha ralang tu byi nang pa myed do// dbang po rnams
i101a2('bum): de bzhin nyid shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi nang pa ma yin/ dbang po rnams kyi de bzhir nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa myed do// dbang po rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa
i101a3('bum): ma yin/ bang po rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyid pa myed do// stobs rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ stobs rnams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol
i101a4('bum): tu phyi po myed do// stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa ma yin/ stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa med do// stobs rnams kyi chos
i101a5('bum): nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu pi rang ba ma yim/ stobs rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa myed do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi nad pa ma yin
i101a6('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams lis gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa med do/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyi rang ba ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag nas kyi
i101a7('bum): de bzhin 'ad las gung na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi nang pa myed do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyin pa myed do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi chos nyid las gud nal
i101a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol du pi rang ba zed do// 'phags pa'i lam yang lag brgyad pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa ma yim/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brkyang pa las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir
i101b1('bum): tha med de/ 'phags pa'i lam yang lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nang pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
i101b2('bum): pa myed do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi rang pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa med
i101b3('bum): do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi radang pa myed do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin
i101b4('bum): nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed do// 'phags pa'i bden pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha
i101b5('bum): rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa myed do// bsam gtan rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ bas rngan
i101b6('bum): rnams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyi na pa tsam yin/ bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang
i101b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha mang tu phyi na pa med do// bsam gtan rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ bras ma gtan rnams kyi chos nyid las gung na yang shes rab kyi pha ro lung tu phyi nang pa ma
i101b8('bum): byed rnams kyang shes rab kyo ba ma du na pa ma man/ tshang med pa rnams las grang na yang shes 'ab kri nga'i la du bri nad pa med do/ tshad myed pa rnams kyi de ba'in nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha ro long du brimeng pa
i102a1('bum): ma yin te tshad med pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa myed do// tshad med pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa ma yin/ tshad myed pa rnams kyi chos
i102a2('bum): nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi nad pa med do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi nang pa ma yir/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gung
i102a3('bum): nayang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed de/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhir nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin
i102a4('bum): las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi rad pa med do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nas
i102a5('bum): kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyind pa med do// rnam par tha rad pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyi nang pa ma yin/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol
i102a6('bum): da pa med pa/ rnam par thad pa rnams kying ba'in nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha ro lang du phyind pa mi smin/ rnam par thang bi'i de bzhin nyid las gung na yang shes rab kyi pa'i spang du ba nga pa byed do/ rnam par
i102a7('bum): rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phrin dpa ma yin/ rnam par tha rung pa rnams kyi chos nying las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa myed do// mtha'ang gis gnas po'i sems par 'dzu
i102a8('bum): rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du pi rang pa ma yin/ mthard kyis gnas pa'i soms par 'jug pa rnams las gang na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi rang ba med do// mtha rang gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
i102b1('bum): pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pa ri lang du phyi nad pa ma yid/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gung na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do// mthar
i102b2('bum): gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyinang pa ma yin/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha ro long du
i102b3('bum): phyi nang pa myed do// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ma yin/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed
i102b4('bum): las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ma yin/ rnam par tha rad
i102b5('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha ro// lang tu phyind pa myed do// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa myed pa'i chos
i102b6('bum): nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myeng pa'i chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa myed do// mngon par shes pa
i102b7('bum): rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi nang pa ma yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyir
i102b8('bum): ba ma yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de ba'i na nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa myed do// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha long du phyi nang pa ma yin/ mngoran par shes
i103a1('bum): rnams kyi ches nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha ralang tu phyind pa med de/ ting nge 'dzi nang rnams kyang shes rab kyi da rol tu phyind pa ma yi/ ting nge 'dzi nang rnams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha
i103a2('bum): tu phyi nad pa myed do// ting nge 'dzind kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ma yin/ ting nge 'dzi rang rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo
i103a3('bum): rnams kyang shes/ rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi nang pa med do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
i103a4('bum): ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa myed do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams
i103a5('bum): kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa myed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa med do
i103a6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi rang pa myed do// 
i103a7('bum): de nga'i na gshegs pa'i sbubs rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du pi dang pa ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi chos nyid las gud na yang nas rab kyi pha lang du phyi nad pa myed do// myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi
i103a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rolang tu rtsi rang pa ma yir/ myi 'jigs pa rnams las gung na yang shes rab kyi pha ro lang du phyi nang pa myed do// mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyi nang pa ma yin/ mi 'jig
i103b1('bum): pa rnams kyi de ba'i na nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa med do// myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa ma yin/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes
i103b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa myed do/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa med do// 
i103b3('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa ma yin/ so so/ yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyind pa myed do// so so yang
i103b4('bum): dag par rig pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyi rang ba ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa myed do// snying rje chen po yang shes
i103b5('bum): rab kyi pha ro lang du phyind pa ma yin/ snying rje chen po las gung na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu pha nang pa med do// snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa ma yin/ snying rje chen po de bzhin
i103b6('bum): nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu pha nang pa myed do// snying rje chen po'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ma yin/ snying rje chen po'i chos nyid las gung rkyen yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa
i103b7('bum): med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang zhes rab kyi pha rolang tu nad pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa pa rnams las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyi nang pa myed do// sangs rgya
