i219a3('bum): pa'i shes rab/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ji ltar yongasu sngos pa'i sbyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ rna ba thams
i219a4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du ji ltar yongasu sngos pa'i tshul khrims/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ji ltar yongasu bsngos pa'i bzod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
i219a5('bum): pa nyid du ji ltar sngo ba'i brtson 'grus brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ji ltar yongasu spos pa'i bsam can bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyedan pa nyid du ji
i219a6('bum): ltar yongasu sngos pa'i shes rab/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo gnyisu med pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongasu sngos pa'i sbyin pa ni smin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
i219a7('bum): ba yin// myi skye ba'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid du yongasu sngos pa'i sbyin pa ni/ sbyin pa'i se rol du phyin pa yid// gnyis myed pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongasu
i219a8('bum): sdos pa'i rdul khrims ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rero lang tu phyin pa yid// mi skye ba'i tshul dang / migs pa'i tshul gis// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du long su bsres pa'i mug khrims ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa yi
i219b1('bum): gnyisu myed pa'i chul gyis rnam pa thams cad mthun pa nyid du yong su smos pa'i bzod pa ni/ bzod pa'i pa 'o ma du phyin na yo mya smra ba'i chus dang / myi dmyigs pa'i mu gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nying du yeng su sres pa'i brjod/ 
i219b2('bum): pa ni/ bzed pa'i pha lang du phyin pa yin// gnyis myed pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongasu bsngos pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi'o// myi skye ba'i nul dang / myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rna pa thams cad / 
i219b3('bum): pa nyid du yongasu sngos pa'i brtson 'grus ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin// gnyisu myed pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongasu bsngos pa'i bsam gtan ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rolang tu phyin pa yin no/ myi ste 'i
i219b4('bum): tshul dang / myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongasu bsngos pa'i bsam gtan ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yino// gnyi su myed pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yong su sngos
i219b5('bum): ba'i shes rab ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// myi skye ba'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongasasu sngos pa'i shes rab ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yino// gsol pa
i219b6('bum): ma ldan sa ji sa gnyisum ma pa'i rdzus dang / ji swA gyi b+h+rUM ba~M chus dang / myo dmyigs po rgyu gyis rnam pa rnams pa mkhyen pa nyid du yo su grol pa'i spyod pa/ phyin pa'i ba la tu phyin palags/ rjes ga
i219b7('bum): mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar mi skye ba'i tshul dang / myi dmigs pa'i tshul gis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yong su sngos pa'i tshul khrims/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ ji ltar gnyis ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / 
i219b8('bum): nges me skye ba'i chus dang myi dmigs pa'i drus gyis rnam pa thams cad maldan panyid du yong su smos pa'i yod pa bzod pa'i pha robad du phyin pa lags/ ji lta gnyisu ma chis pa'i tshul dang / nges kyi skye 'i chus dang mi
i220a1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yong su spros pa'i brtson 'grus/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ ji ltar gnyisum mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji lar myi skye ba'i tshul dang / mi dmigs
i220a2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongasu sngos pa'i bas dan/ bsam rten gyi pha rol du phyin pa lags/ ji ltar gnyisu ma mchis pa'i rdul dang / ji lar mi smra ba'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs pa'i rdul gyis rnam
i220a3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yong su sngos pa'i shes rab/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs gnyisu myed pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba gnyi su myed pa'i tshul dang / 'du shes gnyis myed de
i220a4('bum): tshul dang / 'du byed gnyi su med pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / myig gnyi su med pa'i tshul dang / rna ba gnyi su myed pa'i tshul dang / sna gnyi su med pa'i tshul dang / lce gnyi su meng ba'i tshul dang / lus gnyis
i220a5('bum): med pa'i tshul dang / yid gnyi su myed pa'i tshul dang / gzugs gnyi su med pa'i tshul dang / sgra gnyis med pa'i tshul dang / dri gnyi su med pa'i tshul dang / ro gnyisu med pa'i tshul dang / reg gnyisu med pa'i tshul dang / chos gnyi su med pa'i tshul dang
i220a6('bum): myiyi rnam par shes pa gnyis myed pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i rna bar shes pa gnyi su med pa'i tshul dang / sna'i rna bar shes pa gnyis med pa'i tshul dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa gnyi su myed pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa gnyis med
i220a7('bum): nga'i tshul dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa gnyi su med pa'i rdul dang / myi ga 'dus te reg pa gnyi su myang ba'i tshul dang / rna ba'i dus te reg pa gnyi su myed pa'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa gnyis myed pa'i tshul dang / lce'i dus te reg
i220a8('bum): pa gnyi su myed pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gnyisu med pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gnyi su myed pa'i tshul dang / myig 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor la gnyi su myed pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i'adus te rag pa'i rkyen kyi
i220b1('bum): ma gnyis myed pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi dus te dag pa can gyis tshor ba gnyis med pa'i chus dang / sa'i khams gnasu srung ba'i tshul dang / chu'i khams gnyis myed pa'i dus dang / ma'i khas gnyisu meng pa'i tshul dang / rlung gi/ 
i220b2('bum): gnyis med pa'i tshul dang / nas su la'i khas gnyis myed pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams gnyi su mang ba'i rdul dang / ma rig pa gnyis myed pa'i rdul dang / 'du byad gnyis med pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa gnyis myed
i220b3('bum): pa'i tshul dang / mying dang gzugs gnyisu med pa'i tshul dang / skye mchi drug gnyis myed pa drung / reg pa gnyis yong pa'i rdul dang / tshor ba gnyis med pa'i tshul dang / sred pa gnyis myed pa'i tshul dang / len pa gnyis myed pa tshul dang / 
i220b4('bum): srid pa gnyis med pa'i tshul dang / skye ba gnyi su med pa'i tshul dang / rga shi gnyi su med pa'i tshul dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gnyi su myed pa'i rdul dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis myed pa'i tshul dang / bzod pa'i pha rol
i220b5('bum): tuphyin pa gnyi su myed pa'i tshul dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ga'inyi su myed pa'i tshul dang / ngas can gyi pha ro lang du phyin pa gnyisu myed pa'i tshul dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gnyi su myed pa'i tshul dang / nang stong pa nyid nyis
i220b6('bum): myed pa'i tshul dang / phyi stong pa nyid gnyis myed pa'i tshul dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid gnyis myed pa'i tshul dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gnyi su myed pa'i tshul dang / chen po stong pa nyid de nyi sa myed pa'i tshul dang / dad dam pa stong pa nyid gnyi
i220b7('bum): myed pa'i tshul dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid gnyi su myed pa'i tshul dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gnyis myed pa'i tshul dang / tha las 'das stong pa nyid gnyis myed pa'i tshul dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid gnyis myed pa'i tshul
i220b8('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ga'i su med pa'i tshul dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid gnyis myed pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid gnyi su myed pa'i tshul dang / rang gi tshan nyid stong pa nyid gnyi su myed pa'i tshul dang / myi dmimyigs pa stong pa
i221a1('bum): rgyangs du pa po ma pa du sung du na kyang pang da gnyis myed pa'i tshul dang / ngos pa myed pa nga nyid srung ba nyid gnyis mya nga 'dul dang / dran pa ga pa
i221a2('bum): myong ba'i tshul dang / yang dag par spong ba nas gnyis mang pa'i tshul dang / rdzu pra/ rkang pa rnams gnyis myang ba'i tshul dang / dang po rnaMs gnyisu myang ba'i tshul dang / spangs rnams gnyi su myed pa'i chub dang / byang chudab kyi yan la
i221a3('bum): rnams gnyis myeng ba'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i la yan lag rgyang pa gnyi su med pa'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rdzas gnyis byang ba'i mub dang / bsam tan nas gnyis med pa'i tshul dang / tshang srid pa rnams gnyis mung
i221a4('bum): pa'i tshul dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gnyi su med bu'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa rnams gnyi su myed pa'i tshul dang / thar kyis gnas pa'i spros par 'jug pa rnas gnyisu myed pa'i rdul dang / rna mam
i221a5('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan med pa phyis smra myong pa dang / gnyis byed chul nga ste/ mngon par shes pa rnas gnyis myed pa'i tshul dang / ring 'dzin rnams gnyi su myed pa'i chub dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams gnyi su myed pa'i tshul da
i221a6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams gnyis myed pa'i tshul dang / myi 'jigs pa rnaMs gnyis myed pa'i tshul dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams gnyi su myed pa'i tshul dang / snying rje chen po gnyi su myed pa'i tshul dang / sangs rgyas
i221a7('bum): sa 'dres pa rnams gnyisu med pa'i tshul dang / rgyun du thugs pa'i 'bras bu gnyis med pa'i tshul dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i bras bu gnyisu myed pa'i tshul dang / phyir myi 'ob ba'i 'bras bu gnyi su byed pa'i tshul nga// dgra bco
i221a8('bum): gnyis myed pa'i tshul dang / rang byang chub gnyi su med pa'i rnal dang / la gi rnam par shes pa nyid gnyi su med pa'i tshul dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gnyi su myed pa'i rdul gis yi no// gsol pa bco
i221b1('bum): ji ltar gzugs gnyisu ma mchis pa tshul dang / ji ltar tshor ba gnyi sum mdzes pa'i rdul dang / ngo sar 'du shes gnyisu med pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar du byed gnyisu myang ba'i chul dang / nges rnam par shes pa gnyis myo
i221b2('bum): rdul dang / ji ltar myig gnyi su myed pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rnga ba gnyisu mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sna gnyisu ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lce gnyisu mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lus gnyisu mchis pa'i tshul dang / 
i221b3('bum): ji ltar yid gnyisu ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar gzugs gnyisu ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sgra gnyisu mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar dri gnyisu ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar ro gnyi su mchis pa'i tshul dang ji lta reg
i221b4('bum): gnyi su myed pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar chos gnyis myed pa'i tshul dang / ji lngar myig rna bar shes pa gnyisu ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rna ba'i rna bar shes pa gnyi su mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sna'i rnam par shes pa gnyisu ma
i221b5('bum): tshis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lce'i rnam par shes pa gnyisu ma mchis pa'i chu dadu/ ji ltar lus kyi rnam par shes pa gnyisu ma mchis pa'i rdul dang / ji ltar yid kyi rdza bar shes pa gnyisu mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar myig #
i221b6('bum): reg pa gnyisu mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rna ba'i dus te reg pa gnyisu man pa'i tshul dang / rje ltar sna 'dus de des pa gnyi su mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lde dus te reg pa gnyi su ma mchis pa'i nul dang / ji ltar lus kyi
i221b7('bum): 'dus te reg pa gnyi su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa niganyi su myed pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar myi ga 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor nga gnyi su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rna ba'i dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
i221b8('bum): ba gnyisu mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sna'i dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba hU~M gnyi su mchis pa tshul dang / ji ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshong bapa gnyisu mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyi tshor ma
i222a1('bum): ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar yid kyi 'dus te rag pa'i rkyen gyis tshol pa gnyi su mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sa'i khams gnyi su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar chu'i khams gnyi su mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar me'i khas ga
i222a2('bum): mchis pa tshul dang / ji ltar rlung gyi khas gnyis ma mchis pa'i rdub dang / ji lar nam ma'a'i khams gnyi su mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rna par shes pa'i khams ga'i su mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar ma rig pa gnyis ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / dza
i222a3('bum): 'du byed gnyisu ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar na bar shes pa gnyisu ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar meng dang gzugs gan sum mchis pa'i rdul dang / ji lta s+ya mang drug gnyisu ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rag pa gnyi su mchis kyi chu
i222a4('bum): ji ltar tshor pa gnyi su chis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sred pa gnyi su mchis pa'i nub dang / ji ltar len pa gnyisu mchis pa'i tshul dang / tri ltar srid pa gnyi su mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar skye ba gnyisu ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rga shi gnyi su chas
i222a5('bum): pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gnyisu ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar tshul khris kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyi su mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gnyisu ma mchis pa'i tshul dang // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
i222a6('bum): tu phyin pa gnyi su mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar bas rten gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyisu ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyisu ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar nang stong pa nyid gnyi su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar
i222a7('bum): phyi stong pa nyid gnyi su mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar phyi nang sreng pa nyid gnyi su mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji lngar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gnyisu ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar chen po stong pa nyid gnyisu ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar don dam pa stong
i222a8('bum): pa nyid gnyisu ma mchis pa'i tshub dang / ji ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid gnyi su mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gnyisu ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar tha las 'das pa stong pa nyid gnyis mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar thog/ 
i222b1('bum): dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid gnyisu ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid gnyi su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid gnyisu ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid gnyis
i222b2('bum): mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid pa'i su mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar myi dmyigs pa'i stong pa nyid gnyisu ma mchis pa'i chub dang / ji ltar dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid gnyisu ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji lta'i
i222b3('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gnyi su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gnyisu ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams gnyisu ma mchis pa'i tshub dang / ji ltar yang dag par
i222b4('bum): spong ba rnams gnyisu ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnas gnyisu ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar dbang po rnaMs gnyisu ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar stobs rnams gnyis mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar
i222b5('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag nas gnyisu ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gnyis ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnas gnyisu ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar bas rten rnas
i222b6('bum): gnyisu ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar tshad myed pa rnams gnyisu ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar gzugs myed pa'i smos par 'jug pa rnams gnyis myed pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rna bar thar pa rnams gnyisu ma mchis pa'i tshul da/ 
i222b7('bum): ji lar mthar kyis gnas pa'i spros par 'jug pa rnas gnyi su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smod pa myed pa gnyis pa mchis pa'i rdul dang / ji ltar mngon par shes pa nas/ 
i222b8('bum): gnyi su mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams gnyisu ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar gzungs kyi sgo nas gnyisu ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar de bzhin gshes pa'i stobs nas gnyisu ma mchis pa'i tshul dang
i223a1('bum): ji ltar myi 'jigs pa rnams gnyisu mchis nga'i tshul dang / ji ltar so sa yang dag par rig pa rnams gnyis mchis pa'i rdus dang / ji ltar snying rje chen po gnyisu ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji lar sangs rgyas
i223a2('bum): ma 'dres pa nas gnyisu mchis pa'i tshub dang / ji lta rten tu zhugs pa'i bras bu gnyisu mdzes pa'i tshul dang / ji sa ba lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'bras su gnyi su mchis pa'i tshul dang / zil byar mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gnyisu mchis
i223a3('bum): ba'i tshul dang / nga dgra brtsa pa nyid gnyisu ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rang byang chub gnyi sa mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji lta ral gi rnam par shes pa nyid gnyi su ches pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzas
i223a4('bum): ba'i byang chub gnyisu ma mchis pa'i tshul gis lags// shes rang bas pa rgya dru 'o// // bcom ldan 'das kyis ka stsal pa/ ji ltar gzugs ni gzugs kyis stobaste// daci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'dasam
i223a5('bum): gzugs dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyisu myed gnyisu byar myong// tshor ba ni tsho ngas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ de ni 'di ltar tshor ba dang pha ro lang tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis myong gnyi su byar myeng // de ci'i phyi
i223a6('bum): deni di bya ju shes dang pa rab tu phyin pa 'di dag gces myed de gnyis byang byaspyo// du byed ni 'du byed kyis spong su kyi bye byed/ 'di ya du gas dang ro tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyisu srad dag sa bya
i223a7('bum): rna bar shes pa ni lnga par shes pas stong ste// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rno bar shes pa dang 'i rol du phyin pa 'di dag gnyi su myed gnyisu byar myong // myig ni mig gis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar myig dang pa
i223a8('bum): ro tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis myeng dganyisu byar myodo// rna ba ni rnang ma / ngoba'i phyi gan don 'di ba dab dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyi su meng gnyis byar med do/ sngon sngam stong ste/ dpa'i phyi ba ni da
i223b1('bum): 'di ltar sna dang pha rol tu phyin pa di dag ga su lung dag su bar med // ni skyes stong / ci'i phyi na da/ dang disar ltu pa mi rjon pa 'a na na nyi myed de gsu dur myong // lum sa gyi bya chu tha ci byed/ 
i223b2('bum): de ni 'di ltar lus dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyi su med de gnyisu bar meng // yid ni yid kyis spong ste// de ci'i phyir zhe na// de ni 'di ltar yid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyisu mya dengade gnyis byar med// gzugs ni gzugs kyis
i223b3('bum): stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na 'di ltar gzugs dang pha rol tu phyin pa gnyi su myeng gnyi su byar myed do// sgra ni sgras stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na// de ni 'di ltar sgra dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis myed gnyisu byar myeng // dri ni dris stong
i223b4('bum): ngo ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dri dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyi su myed de gnyisu byar mye do// ro ni ros stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyi su myed de gnyis byar myedado// reg ni reg gis stong ste/ 
i223b5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rag dang pa yod du phyin pa 'di dag gnyisu myed de gnyis kyabyang mdo// chos ni chos kyis song ste/ de ci'i phyir zhon/ de ni 'di lnga chos dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyisu med de gnyisu byar myong / 
i223b6('bum): myig gi rna bar shes pa ni myig gi rnam par shes pa stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar myig gi rnam par shes pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyi su myed de gnyis byar medado// rna ba'i rna bar shes pa ni rna ba'i rna bar shes pa spong
i223b7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ldar na pa'i rnaM lags pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis myed de gnyis byar myed do// sna'i rna bar shes pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pas stong ste// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sna'i rnam par shes pa
i223b8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis myed gnyis par myed do// bya'i rna par shes pa na lha'i ni po shes pas stong ste/ de ni'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lce'i rnam par shes pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis skyed gnyisu byang myong lus
i224a1('bum): rnam pa shes pa ni ngas kyi rnam pa sha pa yo ste/ dpa'i byi gas di samasas kyinam na tu chun pa 'di dag gnasu mang da gnyis cur myong // yang sa rnapa gas pa ni yid kyin la gas pas
i224a2('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na// de ni 'di ltar yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyi su myeng de gnyisu byang medo// myig gi 'dus te reg pa ni phyag gi 'dus pa rag pas songs// daci'i phyir zhe na/ dedi 'di ltar myig 'dus te reg pa da
i224a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyi su myed de gnyis byar myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i'adus te reg pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyi su myed de gnyi su byar myong / sna'i dus te reg pa
i224a4('bum): ni sna 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyi su myed de gnyis byar myed// lce'i dus te reg pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lce'i dus
i224a5('bum): reg pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyi su med de gnyis par medo// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pas stong sde/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyi su med gnyis su bya
i224a6('bum): mye// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyi su med de gnyisu byar myed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni myig gi
i224a7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rten gyis tshor ba dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis myed gnyis byar myong // rna ba'i dus pa reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni rna ba'i dus te reg pa
i224a8('bum): rkyen gyis tshol bas stongs/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rna ba 'dus pa dag pa'i rlan kyis char ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis myang de gnyisu byar myongo/ sde dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni sna'i dus te reg pa'i rgyan kyis tsho bas sung sde
i224b1('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ ni 'di ltar sA dus kyi dag pa'i rkyen gyis rje bapa dag / pa rong du smin pa 'didas gnyis myeng de gnyis byang byed// sa dag pa rnyan kyis ni ma dag pa tshus gyis tshor bas songs// de ci'i phyi nan/ 
i224b2('bum): de ni 'di ltar lce'i dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyisu byar myedado// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na de ni de
i224b3('bum): ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyi su byar myedado// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di lta
i224b4('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis myemed de gnyis byar myong // sa'i khas ni sa'i khams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sa'i khams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyi su myed de
i224b5('bum): gnyisu byar myedado// chu'i khas ni chu'i khams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chu'i khams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyi su myed gnyis byar medado// me'i khas ni me'i khams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar
i224b6('bum): me'i khas dang pha rol tu phyin pa de dag gnyisu myed gnyis byar mye // rlung gi khams ni rlung gi khams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rlung gi khams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis myed gnyisu byar mye'o// namakha'i khas
i224b7('bum): ninam mkha'i khas kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar nam mkha'i khas dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyi su myed de gnyis byar myed do// rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rno bar shes pa'i khas kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
i224b8('bum): de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i khams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyisu med de gnyis par myed// ma rig pa ni ma rig pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar ma rig pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyisu med gnyisu
i225a1('bum): da byad ni du byang kyis stong na/ kyi'i byi nang/ na nga bya du byed dang pa 'omang tsung pa dag pa'asu myed dag su kyang med// rma gas pa rnam par gas pas song ste/ da ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngan 'dres pa
i225a2('bum): pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag ga'i su myed gnyisu byar med do// mying dang gzugs ni mying dang gzugs kyis song ste/ daci'i phyir zhe na de ni 'di ltar mying dang gzugs dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis myed de gnyis byar mya dang / 
i225a3('bum): skye ched drug ni skye mched drug ni stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na// de ni 'di ltar skye ched drug dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyi su myed do// reg pa ni reg pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na// de ni 'di ltar 'dreg pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyisu
i225a4('bum): mying gnyi su byar myed do// tshor ba ni tshor bas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar tshor ba dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyi su myed gnyi su byar med do// sred pa ni sred pa stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sred pa dang pha rol tu
i225a5('bum): phyin pa 'di dag gnyis myed de gnyisu par mdo// len pa ni len pas song ste// de ci'i phyir zhe na// de ni 'di ltar len pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis med de gnyis byar myong // srid pa ni sred pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhen de ni 'di la
i225a6('bum): gling pa dang pha rog tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis myed de gnyisu byar myong // skye ba ni skye bas spong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga ni 'di ltar skye dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis myeng gnyis par myod/ ma shini narga shis stong sa de ci'i phyir zhe ni sa
i225a7('bum): 'di ltar rga shi dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyi su myed gnyisu byar med// nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na// de ni 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis myed de gnyis byar myong// 
i225a8('bum): phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar phyi stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyisu myong gnyi su byar myo'o// phyi nang spong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis song ste/ de ci'i phyir na/ deni 'as kya
i225b1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyi su myed de gnyi su byar myed// chen po stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir na na// de ni 'di ltar chen po stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyi su myed de gnyis byar mye
i225b2('bum): don de pa stong pa nyid ni don de pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis myed de gnyis byar myed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis spong sngo/ 
i225b3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyi su myed de gnyisu byar myed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang
i225b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyi su myed gnyis byar myedado// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni tha las byungs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar tha las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyi su myed gnyisu
i225b5('bum): byar myed// thog dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar thog ma dang tha myed pa stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyi su myed de gnyis byar mdo// dor pa myed pa/ 
i225b6('bum): stong pa nyid ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyi su myed de gnyisu byar mye do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 
i225b7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyi su myed de gnyisu byar mye // chos thas cad stong pa nyid ni chos thams cad kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos thas cad stong pa nyid dang
i225b8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyisu med de gnyis byar myedado// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyi su med/ 
i226a1('bum): gnyisu byar myedado/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis spong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na de ni 'di ltar myi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyi su myed gnyisu byar med/ dngos po myed
i226a2('bum): pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na// de ni 'di skar dngos po myeng pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol da phyin pa 'di dag gnyis myed de gnyisu byar meng // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ning po nyid sdong po'i dkyis song/ 
i226a3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ doni 'di ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis myed de gnyis byar myong // dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po myeng ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis song ste/ de ci'i phyin la na/ de ma
i226a4('bum): ltar dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyi su myed de gnyis byar myo // dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rjes kyis stong ste// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa
i226a5('bum): sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyi su med de gnyisu byar myed// yang dag par spong ba rnas ni yang dag par spong ba rnaMs kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyisu mye
i226a6('bum): gnyis byar mye'o// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnaMs kyis stong ste// dacing phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul gi nang pa rnas dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyi su med de gnyisu byang myed do// dang pa po rnas ni dang po rnaMs kyi
i226a7('bum): tsa'i phyi ban// ngani 'di ga nga ba rnam na la ro tu dran pa 'di dag gnyis myeng nga gnyis byang mod// sangs rjo'i songs du kyis stong ste/ daci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di phrar spongs rgyas dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag pa su myo gnyis
i226a8('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rna ni byang chub kyi yan grwa rnaMs kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dpe pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyi su myed de gnyisu byar myedado// le ni la gis stong ste de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di lta
i226b1('bum): lam dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis myed de gnyi su kyar mdo// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnas kyis stong sa// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dzi ni 'di ltar 'phags pa'i bded pa rnas dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyisu rme
i226b2('bum): gnyis byar myed do// bsam gtan rnams ni bsam rten rjes kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar bas rten rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyi su myed de gnyisu byar mye // tshad myed pa rnaMs ni tshad myed pa rnams kyis spong ste
i226b3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar tshad myed pa rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa de dag gnyi su myed de gnyisu byar myed gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnas ni gzugs myed pa'i spros par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na de na 'di
i226b4('bum): lngar gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nas dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyi su myed de gnyisu byar myong // rna bar thar pa rnams ni rnam par thar pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rna bar thar pa rnams dang pa
i226b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyisu myed de gnyis byang mye'o// thar kyis gnas pa'i smos par 'jug pa rnas ni thaMb kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar thar kyis gnas pa'i spos pa
i226b6('bum): pa rnaMs dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyi su myed de gnyi su byar myed// rna bar thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ni/ rna bar thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan myed pa dang / smon pa myed pas stong ste de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
i226b7('bum): de ni 'di ltar rna bar thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyidang / tshan myed pa dang / smon pa med pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyi su myed de gnyi su byar myed do// mngon par shes pa rnams ni mngon par shes pa rnaMs kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar mad
i226b8('bum): par shes pa rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyi su med de gnyis byar myeng // ting nge 'dzin rnaMs ni ting 'dzin rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin rnaMs dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyisu myed pa gnyi su bar med
i227a1('bum): gzungs kyi sgra rnams sa gdus kyi sgo rnams kyis sangaso+o/ dma'i phyir zhe na// don 'di lta gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis mye nga gnyis byar mdo// de bzhin gshegs
i227a2('bum): dade bzhin gshegs pa'i stongs rnams kyis stong sa// de ci'i phyi bas na// do ni 'di ltar da bzhin gshegs pa'i stongs rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis myed de gnyisu byar med// myi 'jigs pa rnaMs ni ma 'jig nga rnam
i227a3('bum): sdong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga ni 'di ltar mi 'jigs pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis med gnyisu byang myed// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis stong ste// de ci'i phyir zhe na// de ni
i227a4('bum): lha so so yang dag par rig pa ni dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyi su myed de gnyis par med// snying rje chen po ni snying rje chen pos song ste// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar snying rje chen po dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag
i227a5('bum): gnyi su med de gnyis byar mye // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnaMs ni sangs rgyas kyi chos 'das pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dres pa rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
i227a6('bum): ngag gnyi su myed de gnyisu byar medo// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i bras bu ni rgyud tu zhugs pa'i bras bus stong ste// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rgyun tu zhugs pa'i bras bu dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyi su myed de gnyisu byar mye // 
i227a7('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i bras bu ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong ste// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang pha ro lang tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyi su myed gnyi su byar myed// phyir mi 'ong ba'i bras
i227a8('bum): du ni phyir myi bong ba'i bras bu stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyi su med de gnyi su med do// dgra brtse pa nyid ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyi stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe
i227b1('bum): 'di ltar dgra bcom pa nyid dang pa ral tu phyin pa 'ang dag gnyis byed da gnyis kyang myong // rang byang chub rang byang chub kyis song ste/ de ni'i phyir zhe ni/ ngan 'das parang byang chub dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis mya gnyis
i227b2('bum): myo la gyi rnam pa shes pani lam ke rnam mags pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhen// de ni 'di sngal la gyi rnam padags pa nyid dang rol ldan pa 'di dag gnyis myed gnyis byar myed// blan myang ba ya ga pa
i227b3('bum): pa'i byang chub ni blan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis stong ste// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar drin myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyisu med de gnyis byar mye // de ltas
i227b4('bum): bas na pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gi thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid// stong pa nyid thams cad kyi thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos su cu rtsa bdun gi thog ma
i227b5('bum): ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid / 'jigs pa'i bden pa bzhi'i thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid/ pas rten bzhi'i thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid/ chang myed pa bzhi'i thog mar 'gro ba ni rjes
i227b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid// rna bar tha rad pa rgyad kyi thog mar 'gro da ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid// thar kyis gnas pa'i snyos
i227b7('bum): par 'jug pa chu'i thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid/ rno par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang tshan ma med pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid// mngon par shes pa nA kyi thog mar 'gro ba
i227b8('bum): ni shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa nyid// ting 'dzin thos cad kyi thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid// gzungs kyi sgo thas cad kyi thog mar 'gro ba ni shwe rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid// de bzhin gsheg pa'i stobs cu'i theg
i228a1('bum): mar 'gra ba nags radakyi pa rol du rtsod pa nyid// kye 'jugs pa den thog sar 'gro'i nigs radad la de sa tu phyin pa nyid// sos yang dag par rig pa zhi'i rtag sar 'gro ban gas rang pa mang du phyin pa'ang sas
i228a2('bum): thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa nyid/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa co rgyad kyi thog mar 'gro ba ni gas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid// thes cad shes pa nyid kyi thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha re lang du phyin pa nga
i228a3('bum): shes pa nyid kyi thog mar 'ge ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid// rnam pa thas cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pa ri lad tu phyin pa nyid// rga'i 'di lta ste dper na sa chen po la sa bon tab pa rgya chen tshogs par gyur nas
i228a4('bum): par 'phel bar 'gyur yang sa chen po ni de dag gi gnas te/ sa chen po la rten cing sa ben de dag skye bar 'gyu ro// de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rten cing pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag rna bar 'phelo// nang steng pa nyid rnam par phe le
i228a5('bum): bya stong pa nyid dpar palo// phyi nang stong nga nyid rnam par 'phel// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel chen po stong pa 'di rnam par 'jalo// ded dpa stong pa nyid rnam par 'ang le/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid rna par 'phe'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid
i228a6('bum): par phe'o// tha las 'das pa stong pa nyid rna par 'phe lo// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rna par phe lo// rang bzhin stong pa nyid rno par 'phel lo// chos thams cad stong pa nyid rno bar pe lo// rang gi tshan nyid
i228a7('bum): pa nyid rnam par 'phe'o// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid rnam par 'phe'o// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid rnam par 'phelod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par 'phe'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stod pa nyid rnam par 'phe'o// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnas rnam par sel
i228a8('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams rnam par 'phele/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams rnam par 'phelo// dbang po rnas rnam la ru 'phelo// stobs rnam par 'phele/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnaMs rnam par 'phe'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rna pa
i228b1('bum): 'phagos pa'i bden pa rnas rnam par 'phe'o// bsam gtan rnams rnam par 'phe'o// chad myed pa rnams rnam par 'gro lo// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rnam par 'phel/ rnam par thar pa rnams rna bar 'phelen mthar kyis gnas pa'i
i228b2('bum): slebs par 'jug pa rnams rna par 'gre'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa myed pa rnam par 'grelo// mngon par shes pa rnams rnam par 'phel// ting ngange 'dzin rnam par 'phe'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams rnam par nges
i228b3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs rnams rnam par 'du'o// mya 'gas pa rnams rnam par 'ang le/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams rnam par 'dzi 'o// snying rje chen po rnam par 'phe'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams rnam par sel la pa rnam
i228b4('bum): pa'i rnam par 'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen da srid rnam par 'dil / na rnam mas cad mkhyen pa rjid sa rkyen cing pha rol tu phyin pa lnga rdza bar 'phe 'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi larten cing stong pa nyid thams cad rnam par 'bal
i228b5('bum): rnam par 'phe'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rten cing / dbang po lnga rnam par 'phe'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rten cing / stobs lnga rnam par 'phelo// rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rten cing / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun rje par
i228b6('bum): rnam mas pa ma khyen pa med la yin ring 'phags pa'i las yan lag rgyad pa rnam par de'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'din rten gyi tu phags pa'i bdad pa bzhi rnam par 'baso// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pacings cing des gangs pa
i228b7('bum): chi'o// rnam ma rnams padas byed pa med la zhin gyi chad med pa bzhin pa ba'o/ thams na khyen pa nyid pe/ na pa dgazus mye pa'i spos par 'jug pa nanapa te'o// rnam pa sems khyen pagyings na na da ma ba rgya rnas
i229a1('bum): spo ba byed pa rnam par 'a'i// rnam pa thams cad mabyin pa nyid la rten cing 'dzin lags pa rnams rnam par ba'o// ma pams cad mabyed pa'i ladzin cing kyi 'dzin narnam yin pa'o// rnam pa thams cad
i229a2('bum): pa nyid lazhan cing gzungs kyi sgonas rnam pa lal// rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid la can cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i spongs rnam pa 'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen payi la na ming pa 'jas pa ban
i229a3('bum): par phe lo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rten cing so so yang dag par rig pa bzhin par 'phe'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rten cing / snying rje chen po rna par phe lo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
i229a4('bum): la rten cing sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dres pa bco brgyad rnam par 'phelo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rten cing thams cad shes pa nyid rna bar phe'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rten cing la gi
i229a5('bum): par phe 'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rten cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par pa'o// karga'i de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag yengasu sgrub pa'o// stong pa
i229a6('bum): nyid thams cad yongasu sgrub pa'o// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi yengasu sgrub pa'o// yang dag par spong bu bzhi yongasu sgrub pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi yongasu sgrub pa'o// dbang po lnga yongasu sgrub pa'o snying lnga yongs
i229a7('bum): sgrub pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongasu sgrub pa'o// 'phags pa'i la yan lag brgyad pa yong su sgrub pa'o// 'phag pa'i bden po bani yongasu sgrub pa'i/ ngas can pani yongasu sgrub pa'i tshang med pa bzhi yengasu
i229b1('bum): sgrub pa'o// gzugs mang ba'i sems par 'jug pa bani yongasu sgrub pa'o// rnam par thar pa rgyad yongasu sgrub pa'o// thard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa chu yongasu sgrub pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
i229b2('bum): mchen myed pa dang smid pa myed pa yongs sgru pa'i/ mngon pa gas pa rnams yongs sgrub pa'o// nga badzin rnams yongasu sgrud pa'o// gardudus kyi sgo rnams yongasu sgrub pa'o// de cazhin gshegs pa'i sangs su
i229b3('bum): sgrub pa'o// myi 'jigs pa bzhi yong su sgrub pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi sgrub pa'o// snying rje chen po yongasu sgrub pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco rgyad yong su sgrub pa'o// thes cang shes pa nyid yongasu sgyu
i229b4('bum): le gi rnam par shes pa nyid yongasu sgrub pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongasu sgrub pa'o// de nas lha'i dbang po rgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bco ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
i229b5('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan gang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las thos te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
i229b6('bum): 'di 'dzin pa dang chung ba dang / klog pa dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i yon tan gang ji snyed cig mchis pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i yon tan gang ji snyed cig bdag gis
i229b7('bum): bco ldan 'das las bzung ste// bcangs pa dang / klags pa dang / kun chub par bgyis pa dang / spel ba de dag thams cad ka stsal te/ bco ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung ba dang bcangs pa dang klag
i229b8('bum): pa dang speb pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis pa ni/ dge bcu'i las kyi lce rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur// bas can bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur// tshad myed pa bani 'jig rten du byung bar 'gyuraro gzug myed
i230a1('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa pani 'jig can du 'byung bar 'gyur// yon pa gas pa rnams 'jig can du 'byung bar 'gyung/ smin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ma can du 'byung bar 'gyur/ tshug khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
i230a2('bum): du 'byung bar 'gyu'o/ babang pa'i pha re lang tu phyin pa 'ang gzhan du 'byung bar rdza'o/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ khas nyan ga pa'i yang du phyin pa 'jig can du 'byung dang 'gyu shes
i230a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur// nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur// phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rjen du
i230a4('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur// chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyu re/ don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyuraro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyuraro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung ba 'gyu
i230a5('bum): lus 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong ma nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyu ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung
i230a6('bum): yang // rgyam thas cad byung pa gyi na du m+b+hi'ang sem na nyid stong pamed 'jig tan du 'byung bar gyu / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig tan du 'byung bar 'gyur/ des po myang ba med mi mayig rten du dus
i230a7('bum): tsha ma sa su gang 'i gyi nga mye nga sa la bang u dzu la sa pa gan du zungs lu/ 
i230b1('bum): ma pas lag rgyad pa mig chun ma ga/ chags pa'i na pa zhi di gan du chung ba zung rnam pa rgyad jig tan du 'byung bar 'gyur/ chud byas gnas 'i sus pa jug pa tshu gzhan du
i230b2('bum): mdzu tshus pa'i rnam ba nyid dag byung pa dang ba myed pa 'jig rten du 'dzudus 'thong// nga yin thang ba yin rten du 'byung bar 'gyur// gzus kyi sgo jig can du chung bar 'du rjo pa
i230b3('bum): ba steng 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyuraro// myi 'jigs pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung ngaran 'gyur// snying rje chen po 'dug rten du 'byung bar 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas
i230b4('bum): 'dres pa bcoM rgyad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyu'o// bco ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / klags pa dang kun nung par dgyes pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la dgyes pas rgyal rig che zhing tho
i230b5('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur// dri de'i rigs ni ling mtho ba rnas 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur// khyi dag gi rigs che zhing rdzong nas 'jig rten du 'drung bar 'gyur// rgyal chen pa'i ris kyi lha nas 'jig rten gyiso// su mu bdu
i230b6('bum): lha rnas 'jig rten na mchi 'i tshe ma'i lnga rnams 'jig rten na chis// rga ldan gyi lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis// phrul rga'i lha rnaMs 'jig rten na che so// gzhan phul dbang byed kyi lnga na 'jig rten na ma sto// chang ris kyi lha rnam
i230b7('bum): 'jig rten na mchi so// tshangs lha nye phan gi lha rnas 'jig rten na chiso// tshangs pa kun khor gi lA nas 'jig rten na cheso// tshangs chen gi lha rjes 'jig rten na mchis// snang ba'i lnga rnams 'jig rten na chiso// rlung snang gi lnga
i230b8('bum): ga rten na mchimo chad myed snang ba'i lha rnas 'jig rten na gyis/ kun snang dang 'a'i lha rnams 'jig rten ma mchiso/ rke ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis tshad mya na ba'i lha rdos 'jig rten na mtshomo/ sa rgyas kyi lnga rA 'ji ma ma
i231a1('bum): nas ga/ da ma rdu 'in rnams gnan ma mang chung pa'i ga nas gnan // rnas sum ldanas gas ma mchis so kyi ma ge rnanas 'jig san
i231a2('bum): rnams 'jig tan na mchis/ shin tu thong ba'i lhanas 'angag nas kyis rgyan ma snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig tan na so// 'og rkyen gi lha rnams 'jig ces na mtshosos pam ldan 'das pas rab kyi pa rob tu phyin pa badrung ba dang yang ba
i231a3('bum): grags pa dang kun nub par bgyis pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis pas ni rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams 'jim rten na chiso// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams 'jig rten na mchis/ phyir myi 'ong ba rnams 'jig rten na mchis/ ngas
i231a4('bum): 'jig rten na cheso// rang sangs rgyas 'jig rten na mchis// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rjes 'jig rten na mchis// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzung ba dang bcangs pa dang glags pa dang kur

i231a7('bum): phyi ga na/ rigs kyi bu'i rigs kyi bu mo gang shes pa kyi pa'i lang du ldan pa 'di yin pa dang chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chung par byeng pa dang / chub bzhin du yad 'a byad pa dang / rna tha thams cad ldan pa nyid kyis se

i231b7('bum): rjes dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khris kyi phung po dang / ting rje dzin kyi phung po dang rna bar grol ba'i phung po dang / rna bar grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dang / gang yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dag gi tshul
i231b8('bum): bris kyi phung po dang ting 'dzid kyi phung po dang / shes rad kyi phung po dang / rna bar grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po las/ ke'u shi ka rdul khris kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin kyi phung po rang
i232a1('bum): kyi la bya ma sa ldan sabye cu garba / skye 'grog bya su la
i232a2('bum): chang yang nyi bar myi 'grob/ bgrang bar yang nye ba myi 'gro'o// dpang yang mer mi 'dre'o// rgyu sang ba dang mi bzod/ de ci'i phyir ga na// den 'di ltar rigs kyi du rigs kyi bu mo de dag nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas

i243a5('bum): khams me 'idzin gzug pa yang rnal pa yang dag par rlo pa'i se mas can rdzas kyi dang gsas pa dug parnas pa ma du ma bu dang / shos dang gi dang / sung 'i rna

i243b4('bum): kyi pa' stsal pa/ ke su ni khyod kyis sangam du stong de bzhin gsheg pa'i sku gdung gis byung chu sa ga kyang rnye sa/ shes rab kyi thabal tu phyin pa 'di yang sgeg bram du bris pa zhig kyang la las byin na

i243b7('bum): lag mi rtog pa'i yang ma lag/ btsun par ma bgyid pa yang ma lag te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gsheg pa'i sku gdung la ram 'gro bgyi bar mya 'chal ba 'a / bkar sngar bgyi bar mya 'tshal ba 'am
i243b8('bum): brad dung du babya bar mi 'tshal bu bya/ mchod par bgyi byar 'tshal ba yang ma lag na/ bco ldan bladas de bani ni gzhig po'i sgo gdung de dag kyang sha rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba'i sde/ de'i slad du de ba
i244a1('bum): gshegs pa'i sa rdung rnas kyang rim 'drar ba'o// bkun srid bgyi lags/ phu rung du bo bye lag/ ma pra'i 'apra ga/ sra bdung dag mi shes rab ki pha slab dag pa'i slang du nga bzhin gnag

i244a4('bum): yang bdan pa shag pa'i sku gdung 'di ga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba lag pan/ lha dang myo dang lham yan du gcas pa'i 'jig ma sarbaram 'pher bgyid lag dkar sngar brgya la

i244a6('bum): sha ka sha rab kyi pha rol tu phrand pa ma ni bzung bar yang pa gzug mang pa/ bsngar snang ba/ thigs pa mang ba/ mtshan nyid cig pa ste/ wAr mtshar nyidang meng ba yin mang la khyad ji ltar shes rab
i244a7('bum): phyin pa gzung du mangs/ gzung yang lngar myed pa/ thog pa meng pa/ mtshan mar 'dzin pa ste/ 'od kar mtshan nyid myed pa la gzung dar seMs da ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'ang 'dzin

i244b1('bum): rna bar byung ba'i pa po yin/ songs sa nas na/ srab pa dang u 'i chos rnams par sgru pa yin/ so sa ska ba'atshig 'ang bar byed pa ma yin/ 'dus byas
i244b2('bum): byings nye bar sgrub pa ma yin 'dus ma byas kyi khas 'drar bar byed pa ma yin// skur ba'i pha rol / phyin po nye bar sgrub pa yin/ tshug zas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub / rAn pa 'daba' pa ral

i244b4('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid zhe bar sgrub pa yan stong pa nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa yan/ chen pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa yan/ don du pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa yan/ 'dus byas stong pa 'di nye bar

i244b7('bum): ba myang stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa yan pa/ ngo bo nyid stong ba nyid nye ga sgrub pa ma yin/ dngas pa myed pa'i nga ba nyid stong pa nyid nye kar skab yin// dran pa nye bar gzhig pa rnaMs nye bar sgrub pa yin/ yang da

i245a1('bum): 'phags pa gas yan lag bcang pa sa sgrub pa ma yi ni/ mamig pa ban pan nye bar sprob pa ma yin/ pas te na nas nye bar sgrub pa yin/ ma sa nye bar sgrub ma yin// gzug

i247a1('bum): don 'ad ltar chos kyi dbyangs dang 'ong gapor gyi pha rol tu phyin po de la gnyi su myi ga nyi su byar myong// ke'u na gi gas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la su 'dod yang na chos kyi dbyangs pa gnyis
i247a2('bum): 'dod du zad/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka don 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyisu myang gnyis byar myed/ ke'u shi ka gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ga'i su 'dad pa de ni chas

i248a1('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyi su 'dod pa ni yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnyi su 'dong du rdza/ dpa' par zhe na/ ka'u sha ka ngan 'di sngar tshul khris kyi pha rol tu phan pa dang yang dag pa ma

i248a4('bum): phe ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngapas gdan gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyisu med ga'i su b+ha yang / ke'u zhig gang bas gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyisu 'dod po de ni bas rgya

i248b1('bum): myi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyi su 'dong du zad // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u sha ka de ni 'dra war tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bas sa gyis myi khyab pa'i dbangs de la gnyi su myong gnyis byar mye do ga du

i248b3('bum): bas gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyisu myeng gnyis par mya'o// bam po bcwo brgyad pa'o// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsal
i248b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ang na lha dang myi dang lha yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gas phyag bgyi bar 'os ste// de la slob par byang chub ses dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnaMs bla na myang ba
i248b5('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzog par sangs rgyas// mngon par rdzog par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe/ bdag chos bzangs
i248b6('bum): lha'i 'khor du bdag nyid lnga'i dbang po'i stan la mchis par gyur pa'i tshe/ der lha'i bu gang ji skad bdag gi rim 'gror la mchis pa de dag kun kyang bdag la mchod pa bgyid/ na bdag der mchis shing snyan
i248b7('bum): de ma mchis pa de ya tshe yang lha'i bu de dag 'khor der mchis shang / lha'i dbang po brgya ban stan 'di la 'dug cing / su bcu rtsagasu gyi lha rnas la chos ston to zhes stan de la g.yas phyag su skor ba bgyis
i248b8('bum): phyag 'tshal te slar mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu pha cho 'du phyin pa 'di bris shing 'chang ba dang / kha don du 'byid cing gzhan la rgya cher ston pa dang / phyog bcur 'dzin
i249a1('bum): ran ga khas gang gang rme ka lha dang / klu dang gnod spyan dang / dri ba dang / lha ma yin dang / ma mkha' lding dang myi 'aci'i dang / lho bya chen po ci steng cig mchis pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs dag bcom pa
i249a2('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni 'di las byung ba'i/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thas cad kyang 'di las byung ngo // ses cad kyi bde ba'i ye byad thas cad kyang 'di las byung na shA
i249a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal cing 'dud pa bgyis nas slar mcha'i 'gyuraro// bco ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rjes mchod pa mang po yang she rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o yang su bsku
i249a4('bum): pa'i srang du mchod pa mang pos// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bco ldan 'das byang chub ses dpa' ses dpa' chen po kyad chus sa dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i cha/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni thas na mkhyen pa ya
i249a5('bum): kyi gni gyur to// rgyur gyur to// rgyun tu gyur to// yongasu sgrub par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na tshod gnyis las bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid len to// bcom ldan 'das
i249a6('bum): glang gi tshe bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di blangs te/ chos kyi khongasu gtog pa'i yad kyis kha ton bgyid pa de'i tshe/ 'jigs pa'i// bag tsha ba'i mtshan ma tsam yang yang dag par rjesu
i249a7('bum): phyi mthong / ba ldan 'angs dpe'i gling zhe na// shArab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma mchis// chags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa sten bcom ldan 'das shA rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni srasu mchi
i249a8('bum): ma ldam pa nyin kyi'i ma du phyi pa na mi dam mchis dgras mchis brjod du sa chi bya ste/ bcoMldan 'das pas gtan gyi ma la du zin pa ni su mchis pa'o/ com ldan 'das
i249b1('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma mchis/ rtag ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sme su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das bzod pa'i
i249b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma mchis// rtag mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bco ldan 'das bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sma su mchisa'o// bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtsha
i249b3('bum): mamachis// rtag mchis/ brjod dus mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das tshul khris kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni spos mchis pa/ bcoM ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mucan ma ma mchis/ gas pa mi ga brjod du
i249b4('bum): ma mchis pa ste/ bco ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni smos mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma mchis rtag ma mchis/ brjod du mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das na
i249b5('bum): stong pa nyid ni sposu ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das phyi stong pa nyid ni mtshan mchis// rtags ma mchis/ brjod du mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das phyi stong pa 'di ni spro su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
i249b6('bum): phya stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das phyi nang steng pa nyid na smosu mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid ni mtshan mchis// rtags ma mchis
i249b7('bum): par brjod du mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid ni smos pa'o// bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid na mtshan ma mchis rtag ma mchis pa'o// brjod du mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das chen po stong pa nyid ni smos
i249b8('bum): mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das don dpe stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma mchis pa'o// rtags ma mchis pa'o// brjod du ma mchis pa'o// bco ldan 'das don da pa stong pa nyid ni sla su mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'a
i250a1('bum): byas stong pa'i mas rjes byas spong pa'ang ni smrasu ma mchis panan sdang pos 'dus su ngas sto pa nyid na mtshamam
i250a2('bum): rtags mchisas brjod du ma mchis pa ste bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas stong ba nyid ni sa sum mchis pa'o/ ldan 'das 'dus ma byas spong pa nyid ni mtshan ma mchis/ chags ma mchis brjod dum
i250a3('bum): pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid na spos ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldam sa thog sa ngang tham myang ba stong pa nyid ni mtshan mchis brtags ma mchis kharjod du ma mchis pa'o/ bcom ldan 'das zag ma/ 
i250a4('bum): dang tha myed pa stong pa nyid na smo su mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis pa'o// brjod du mchis pa'o// bco ldan 'das dor ba myed pa sdang ba nyid ni spe su ma mchis pa'o//

i250a8('bum): ldan 'das myi dmigs pa snang pa 'i na sas ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das dngos pa ba po mchis/ rtag ma mchis pa'o// brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das dngos ma/ 
i250b1('bum): pa po tshang pa nyid ni sposus pa sa pa'o/ bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma mchis pa/ sa mchis pa 'i/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni sposu ma mchis pa'o//

i250b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni mchis/ rtags ma mchis// brjod du mchis pa ste// bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnas ni sme su mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das yang dag par

i253a1('bum): bdag na shes rang kya pa yad tu mam pa 'did len to// com ldan 'das de pa'i srad bun ma/ 'di las byung ba ni bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung nas

i253b8('bum): pa dang / lung du bstan pa dang / tshogs sna bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / chos tan la phab pa ngas

i254a1('bum): byang ngan phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dag gags pasang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// 'di mas byung bani mi 'phrul ni pa gsum mo// 'di las byung ban med dang dngas kyis bskrad pa dang / lung dus
i254a2('bum): padang / chags sa sa dpa nga / ming ga nga / phreng gzhi dang / 'dis sa pa dang / smra pa sa dang / shin rgyas pa kyis rang du chu dang / gas pa da pa dang / sa naseM pa ba bstan // pa ma ldan
i254a3('bum): gzhan yang phyogs su'i phyogs ra shing gang gi'i zung gi rgyam sring kyi 'jig tan gi las nyi bzhin gshegs pa dgras pa yang dag pa rdzo gu pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la ma tog dang / phreng ba dang thug pa dang bye ma pan pa das
i254a4('bum): bral margan dang / ba dan dang / sa li snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur si dang / phu dud dang / mchod par bgyis pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di glegs bam la bris shing me tog dang / phreng ba dang spos dang byug
i254a5('bum): pa dang / phyi ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / kha dan dang / sa li snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa bgyid pa yang myi 'dra ba ma mchis// de ci'i srad du zhe na/ 'di las ts+tsha
i254a6('bum): ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam so// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog
i254a7('bum): kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid cing / gzhan la yang rgya cher ston pa de ni seMs can dmyal ba'i rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// khyel song gi sku gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gi rgyud kyi dogs pa
i254a8('bum): mchis par bgyi'o// nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// de ci'i srad du zhe na/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni phyir myi ldog pa'o sa la gnas par rig par dbye'i da po'i slad dus
i254b1('bum): 'di ltar de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa 'di bris shing 'dzin to// 'chang ngo klog go// kun chub par bgyid do// tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid do// bris pa de la yang me tog dang phreng ba dang / spos dang byug pa dang / phye ma dang na
i254b2('bum): bza' dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sa li swan sna tshogs kis rimi gror bgyid// bkur stir bgyid/ bu drang du bgyid/ mchod par bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di ni 'jig
i254b3('bum): thams cad zhi bar bgyid pa'o// nad thas cad rab tu sel to// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang / kun chud par
i254b4('bum): ba dang / de la me tog dang phreng ba dang / spos dang byug pa dang phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang mchod par bgyid pa des na gang nas
i254b5('bum): kyang 'jigs pa 'byung ba'i dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu nor gi bdag po zhig 'jigs nas rgyal po la gnas shing rgyal po la rten na de rgyal po la gan shing rgyal po la rten pa
i254b6('bum): su zhig 'jigs pa de dag nyid kyang de la rten pas/ de dag 'jigs par myi 'gyuraro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gsha' ste/ gang rgyal po la rten pa ni mthu dang ldan pa la rten pa'o// bco ldan 'das de bzhin du bzhin
i254b7('bum): gshegs pa'i sku rlung de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu sgrubs pas na mchod pa mnga'o// bcom ldan 'das rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gang lags pa de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongasu bsgrubs pa lta'o/

i258b5('bum): bco ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa rnaMs kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnaMs kyi
