i258b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das tshad ma mchis pa rnaMs kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ tshad med pa rjes kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang tshad med pa rnaMs kyi snod do// bco ldan 'das gzug
i258b8('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rjes kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjed par bgyi ste// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi yon tan na tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang gzugs med pa'i smos par 'jug
i259a1('bum): brjes kyi snod de// bcom ldan 'das rna bar tha rad pa rnams kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de / 
i259a2('bum): kyang rnam par tha rad pa rnaMs kyi snod do// som ldan 'das mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rjes kyi yon tan lnga ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnas kyi
i259a3('bum): tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mthar kyis gnas pa'i spros par 'jug pa rnams kyi snod do// bco ldan 'das rnam par thard pa'i sde stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang
i259a4('bum): smond pa med pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo rnaMs kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rnam par tha rad pa'i ske rnaMs kyi snod de// 
i259a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das mngon par shes pa rjes kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ mngon par shes pa rnaMs kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mngon par shes pa rnaMs
i259a6('bum): kyi snod de// bco ldan 'das ting nge 'dzind rnams kyi yon tan lnga ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ ting nge 'dzind rnaMs kyi yon tan ni ched ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang ting nge 'dzind rnaMs kyi snga
i259a7('bum): de// bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi yon tan ste ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams
i259a8('bum): snod ngo // bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stengs rnas kyi yon tan lnga ji srid cig brjod par dgyi ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stongs rnaMs kyi yon tan na tshing ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
i259b1('bum): gdung de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rjes kyi snod do// bco ldan 'das myi 'jigs pa rnas kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ mi 'jigs pa rnaMs kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs
i259b2('bum): pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mi 'jigs pa rjes kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das so so yang dag par rig pa rjes kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnas kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de
i259b3('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang so so yang dag yar rig pa rjes kyi snod do// bco ldan 'das snying rje chen po'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi stesnying rje chen po'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
i259b4('bum): sku gdung de dag kyang snying rje chen po'i snod do// bco ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnaMs kyi yon tan lnga ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rjes kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs
i259b5('bum): pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rjes kyi snod do// bco ldan 'das thams cad shes pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig rjod par bgyi ste/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis se
i259b6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag thams cad shes pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das lam gyi rnam par shes nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyi yon tan ni
i259b7('bum): tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rdung de dag kyang le gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rnam pa thas na
i259b8('bum): mkhyend pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rdung de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ 
i260a1('bum): da na nam ma'o// debazhi gaganas pa'i R+Wa da kya de zhin nyid kyi da // ma ldan 'das sanor ba bzhin nyid kyi yon tanas ji skad cig rjo bur bgyiste/ mnar
i260a2('bum): bzhin nyid kyi yon na mi changs mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rlung de dag kyang ma nor pa de bzhin nyid kyi snying // bcom ldan 'das gzhan ma yin pa de nyid kyi yon tan la ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi
i260a3('bum): ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi yon ta ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku drung de dag kyang gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das chos nyid kyi yon tan la ji skad cig brjod par bgyi sa
i260a4('bum): chos nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rdung de dag kyang chos nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyi yon pa
i260a5('bum): ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rdung de dag kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi gnas nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ chos kyi gnas nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma
i260a6('bum): mchiso// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rdung de dag kyang chos kyi gnas nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das chos myi 'gyur ba nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste// chos myi 'gyur ba nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis
i260a7('bum): so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku drung de dag kyang chos myi 'gyur ba nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i mtha'i yon tan sta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi sde/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i yon tan ni chad ma mchis so// 
i260a8('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nu de dag kyang yang dag pa'i mtha'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i yon dan lnga ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi sde/ bsam kyis myi khyab pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/ 
i260b1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rdung de dag kyang bsam gis myi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das cha bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba'i yon tan lta ji skad cig brjod par bgyi ste/ 
i260b2('bum): bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs thams cad spang ba'i yon tan ni mtshams ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rdung de dag kyang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thos cad spang ba'i
i260b3('bum): snod do// bcom ldan 'das rtag tu btang snyoms la gnas pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rtag tu btang snyoms la gnas pa'i yon tan ni mtshad mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rdung de
i260b4('bum): ngag kyang rtag tu btang snyoms la gnas pa'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das myi nyam pa'i chos nyid kyi yon tan la ci snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ myi nyam pa'i chos nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad mchis so// de bzhin gshes
i260b5('bum): pa'i sku rdung de dag kyang myi nyam pa'i chos nyid kyi snod de// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rlung de dag ni pha rold tu phyind pa rin po che'i snon/ 
i260b6('bum): debs ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bu drung de dag ni mtshad pa yang // sa ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rlung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa kun nas nyon cings pa ma mchis pa'i dang rnam par byu
i260b7('bum): ma mchis pa'i thod de// de bas na du bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rung de dag ni mchod pa yanga'o// btsam lan 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku drung de dag ni pha ro lang tu byin pa kyi skye myobanag po na
i260b8('bum): da pa ban ni gsapa mi lu ju dag tshad pa na das de bzhin gag u m+sa da mas du nga 'das yod/ 
i261a1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rlung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rlung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang gnas ma mchis pa'i snod du
i261a2('bum): de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyind pa'i mchod nyid kyi snod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rdung de dag
i261a3('bum): ni pha rol tu phyind pa'i chos nyid kyis skems pa'o// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mya ngan las 'das kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mchod pa mnga'o// gzhan yang stong gsu
i261a4('bum): gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khaMs de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rlung gis byur bur yongs bltam pa lnga zhog kyi/ bcom ldan 'das gal te phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi
i261a5('bum): bye ma snyed cig de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rdung byur bur bltam pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa glegs bam tu bris pa zhig bsngal na/ bcom ldam 'das rnam pa de gnyis las bdag ni
i261a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di nyid yind to// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku
i261a7('bum): gdung rnas te/ mchod pa mnga'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa yongs su snyoms pa na// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rdung de dag kyang mchod pa mnga' ste/ bcom ldan 'das rigs
i261a8('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mu rung rnams la / rom 'gro bgyid pa dang ga bkur mi bskyed pa dang / phung du du 'irnyed pa dang / mchod pa bgyid pa yang dge ba'i rtsab pa'i
i261b1('bum): rgyo gas shing rgya la rigs ni zhing mthong 'a dang / bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho' ba dang / khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mthu ba dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lha 'am/ sum bcu rtsa gsug
i261b2('bum): lha 'am/ mche mo'i lha 'am/ dka' ldan gyi lnga 'am// 'phrul dga'i lnga 'am// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i nang du myi dang lha'i phun sum tshogs pa dang bde ba myong nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis
i261b3('bum): sdug sngal gyi mthar 'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mchod pa'i 'bras bu ni de tsam du bas kyi sha shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind 'di bzung zhing bcangs pa dang / klags shing / kun chub pa bgyis
i261b4('bum): ba dang // tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis na ting nge 'dzind kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bzod pas pha rol
i261b5('bum): tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyis pha ro lad tu phyind pa yong su rdzog par 'gyur ro// sbyind pa'i sa pha rol du phyi nad pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// nang stong pa nyid yongasu
i261b6('bum): rdzogs par 'gyur ro// phyi stong pa nyid yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// chen po stong
i261b7('bum): panyid yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dan dam bu stong pa nyid yongasu rdzugs par 'gyuraro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas song ba nyid yongs rdzog par
i261b8('bum): 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyidadi yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// thog sa dang tha yi byed pa spong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyuraro// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongasu rdzog pa / 
i262a1('bum): nyid yong rdzogs pa 'gyur ro// de ma 'i myed pa sring kyi nyid seM su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// ma pa nyid spong ba nyid yong su rdzogs par 'gyur// das po myed pa'i rngam nyid stong pa nyid yongs su
i262a2('bum): rdzogs par 'gyuraro// dran ma ra bzhag pa bzhi yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// yang dag par gang ba bzhi yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ 
i262a3('bum): dbab po lnga yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// stobs lnga yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongasu
i262a4('bum): rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bas rten bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// tshad myed pa bzhi yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gzugs myed pa
i262a5('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa brgyad yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 
i262a6('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang // mtsham sa myed pa dang / smyon pa myed pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa rnams yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzind rnams yongasu
i262a7('bum): rdzogs par 'gyur // gzungs kyi sgo rnam mo ngas su rdzogs por 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems bcu yongs par 'gyur ro// ji 'am pa pa'i yongs sa rdzog pa pa
i262b1('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de tshad du
i262b2('bum): bsams te/ yongs su 'dzind par 'gyur// lus de dag gis sems can yongasu smind par bgyid par 'gyur te/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i lus sam/ rgyal rigs che zhing mthong ba 'am/ bram ze'i
i262b3('bum): rigs che zhing mtho' ba 'am/ khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho bar skyes pa'i lus sam/ brgya byin gi gzugs sam/ tshangs pa'i gzugs sam/ ngal so po'i gzugs kyang rung ste/ lus
i262b4('bum): de dag gis sems can yongasu smyind par 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi sa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das te/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed 'jug par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i
i262b5('bum): skyon myed par zhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa thob nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi ga/ 
i262b6('bum): 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bas na bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rdung la rim 'gro ma mchis pa yang ma lags/ glo ba ma ches pa yang ma mchis/ mchod par myi 'tshal ba yang ma lag
i262b7('bum): bzung bar myi 'tshal ba yang ma lags ste/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa/ 'di ni rigs bu'am rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyis rim 'gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud du dang
i262b8('bum): mchod par bgyis na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rgyu shinan du bsogs pa legs// phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang yongs su mi nadang par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshu
i263a1('bum): bku dang / d+hA drA / pa mas par gyu/ na 'as gzhan yang byags su ga can ga la ma chad kyang grangs byed pa das
i263a2('bum): de bzhin gshenas pa gra tsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bzhugs shing mna' snang ba dang / chos stond pa de dag chos kyi sku dang / gzugs kyi sku dang / ye shes kyi skur
i263a3('bum): thong bar mtshal zhing / mchod par 'chal bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyid bzung bar bgyi/ bcang bar bgyi klag par bgyi/ kun chub par bgyi/ gzhan la rgyo cher yang dag par sten
i263a4('bum): par bgyi/ tshul bzhin du yang yid la bgyi ste// rigs kyi bu'i rigs kyi bu mo des ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gras dang tshad ma mchis pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag pa rdzogs/ 
i263a5('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bas na rigs kyi bu'i rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa des/ chos nyid du sangs rgyas dran pa sgom par bgyi'o// bcom
i263a6('bum): ldan 'das gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'i rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa bcom pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mthong bar 'tshal bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di bzung
i263a7('bum): bar bgyi bcang bar bgyi/ kun chub par bgyi klag par bgyi/ mchod par bgyi/ gzhan la rgya cher yang dag pa bstand par bgyi// chos nyid tshul bzhin du yid la bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das
i263a8('bum): gnyis po 'di dag ni chos nyid de/ gnyis gang zhe na// 'dus byas tshas nas kyi chos nyid dang / 'dus ma byas nas chos nyid btsa ldan 'das de la 'dus byas chos nas kyi chos nyid gang lags zhen rang song ba
i263b1('bum): nyid kyi ye shes dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang // phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang dan pa snang pa nyid kyi ye shes/ 
i263b2('bum): dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang // thog ma dang tha ma myed pa snang nyid kyi ye shes dang / dor ba
i263b3('bum): pa stong nyid kyi ye shes dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / chos thos cad stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ye she dang
i263b4('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / dran nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i ye shes dang yang dag
i263b5('bum): par spong ba bzhi'i ye shes dang rdzu 'phrul gri pa bzhi'i ye shes dang // dang po lnga'i ye shes dang / stobs lnga'i ye shes dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi ye shes dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan brgyad
i263b6('bum): pa'i ye shes dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / bas rten bzhi'i ye shes dang // tshad myed pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / gzugs myed par snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i ye shes dang rtarnaM par thar pargyad kyi ye shes dang
i263b7('bum): mthar kyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nu'i ye shes dang / rnam pa tha rad pa brgyad kyi sgo stong pa nyidade/ mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i ye shes dang // mngon par shes pa lnga'i ye shes dang / ting 'dzin nas kyi ye she dang
i263b8('bum): gzungs kyi sgo thas cad kyi ye shes dang dede bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ye shes dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / snying rje chen po bzhi'i ye shes dang sangs rgyas
i264a1('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi ye shes dang / dga' ba'i chos nas kyi ye shes dang / myi nel ba'i chos rnaMs kyi ye shes dang zag pa khyad pa'i chos rnas kyi ye shes dang / zag pa dang bcas pa rnas kyi ye shes dang / 'jig rten
i264a2('bum): chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes gang lags pa de ni 'dus byas/ chos rnaMs kyi chos nyid ces bgyi'o// de la 'dus ma byas chos rnaMs kyi chos nyid gang lags zhe na/ de ni gang la skye ba ma
i264a3('bum): mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / gnas pa ma mchis pa dang / gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa dang / 'phel ba ma mchis pa dang / 'grib
i264a4('bum): pa ma mchis a ste/ da ni chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid do// chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid gang lags zhe na/ chos thos nad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid te/ 'di ni 'dus ma bcas chos rnaMs kyi chos nyid ces bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'a
i264a5('bum): kyis bka' rtsa lad pa/ ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad 'od
i264a6('bum): la rten te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// ma byon pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba
i264a7('bum): dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyid la rten cing dabla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// da ltar 'byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed grangs myed pa dag na de ba
i264a8('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang rdo snyed cig bzhugs shing mcher skyong bya dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la rten te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
i264b1('bum): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyed cig byung ba dang / ma byon pa'i de bzhin gzugs/ 
i264b2('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyed cig byung ba dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bco pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnas kyi nyan thos gang ji snyed
i264b3('bum): cig yod de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyid la rten te/ rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// la nad cig phyir 'ong 'bras bu thob 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'a#
i264b4('bum): bu thob bo// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bco pa nyid thob bo// 'thob bo// thob pa 'gyu ro// 'das pa'i dus kyi rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba dang
i264b5('bum): da ltar byung ba'i 'jig rten gi khaMs tshad myed grangs myed pa dag na// rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'khod cing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di nyid la rtend te/ rang byang chub thob 'thob bo/ 
i264b6('bum): tho par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las theg pa gsum po thams cad rgya cher bstand to// de dag kyang mtshan myed pa'i tshul dang / myi dmigs pa myed pa'i tshul dang / 
i264b7('bum): skye ba myed pa'i tshul dang / 'gag pa myed pa'i tshul dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa'i chal dang / rno bar byang ba med pa'i tshul dang // mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa'i tshul dang / ldand pa myed pa'i tshul dang / 'dor ba myed pa'i tshul
i264b8('bum): dang / 'brib pa skyed pa'i tshul dang / bstan pa skyed pa'i tshul dang / thang ba myed pa'i dus dang / srang 'i myed pa'i tshul zhes san pa/ de yang jog rten gis ga gi chul gis sand kyi/ don pa la dmas so
i265a1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ni ring du song ba ma yin/ pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa ni chu ral ma yin/ pha rol ma yin/ thang du 'dug bla ma
i265a2('bum): gzhong du 'dug pa ma yin// mnyam pa ma yin myi mnyam pa yin/ mtshan ma mu yin// 'jig rten pa ma yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa ma yin/ 'dus byas ma yin/ 'dus ma byas ma yin/ rke ba ma yin
i265a3('bum): myi dge ba ma yin/ 'das pa ma yin 'ong ba ma yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin to// ke'u shi ka shis rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnaMs nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ke'u shi ka rgyu nad tu zhugs
i265a4('bum): pa'i chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin// ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni lan cig phyir 'ong 'bras bu'i chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin// ke'u mig shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ni
i265a5('bum): phyir myi 'ong ba'i chos rnaMs nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni dgra btso pa'i chos rnaMs nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi chos
i265a6('bum): nas nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnaMs 'dor ba ma yin no// / bam po bcu dgu pa'o// / brgya byin kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol
i265a7('bum): tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyi nad pa chen po ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di las spyod pa nas ni sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / 
i265a8('bum): spyod pa yang 'tshal te/ seMs can du dmyigs pa ma mchis so// sems can du gdags par dmyigs pa ma mchis so// bdag tu dmyigs pa ma mchis so// sems can du dmyigs pa ma mchis so// 
i265b1('bum): srog du dmyigs pa ma mchis so// 'gro ba dmyigs pa ma mchis so// gsol bar dmyigs pa ma mchis// skyes bur dmyigs pa ma mchis// gang zag du dmyigs pa ma mchis so// shed can du dmyigs pa ma mchis
i265b2('bum): shed bdag tu dmyigs pa ma mchis// byed pa por dmyigs pa ma mchis so// tshor ba por dmyigs pa ma mchi so// shes pa par dmyigs pa ma mchis// / mthong ba por dmyigs pa ma mchis so// gzugs su mi
i265b3('bum): pa ma mchis so// tshor bar dmyigs pa ma mchis so// 'du shes su dmyigs par ma mchis so// 'du byed du dmyigs par ma mchis so// rnam par shes par dmyigs pa ma mchis s+ho// mying du dmyig pa mchis
i265b4('bum): rna bar dmyigs pa ma mchi so// snar dmyigs pa ma mchis so// lcer dmyigs par ma mchiso// lus su dmyigs par ma mchis / yid du dmyigs par ma mchis so// myig gi rnam par shes pa dmyig pa
i265b5('bum): ma mchis so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dmyigs par ma mchis so// 5/ sna'i rna bar shes pa dmyigs par ma mchis// lce'i rnam par shes pa dmyigs par ma mchis// lus kyi rnam par shes pa dmyigs par
i265b6('bum): ma mchi'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa dmyigs pa ma mchi so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa dmyigs pa mA mchi sa so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg par dmyig pa ma mchis so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa dmyigs pa mchis
i266a1('bum): sa bya'i tshor bar dmyigs pa ma mchis so// lus kyis 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmyigs pa ma mchis so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmyigs pa ma mchis
i266a2('bum): sa'i khas su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// chu'i khams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// me'i khrus su dmigs pa ma mchis so// rlung gi khams dmyigs pa ma mchis so// nam mkha'i khas su dmyigs pa ma chis
i266a3('bum): rnam par shes pa'i kha sa dmyigs pa ma mchis so// ma rig par dmyigs pa ma mchis// 'du byed du dmyigs pa ma mchis/ rnam par shes par dmyigs pa ma mchis sa/ mying dang gzugs su dmyigs pa ma mchis so//

i266a5('bum): par dmyigs pa ma mchis so// skye bar dmyigs pa ma mchis so// rga shir dmyigs pa ma mchis// sbyind pa'i pha rol tu phyind par dmyigs pa ma mchis so// tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind par dmyigs
i266a6('bum): pa ma mchis so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind par dmyigs pa ma mchis so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind par dmyigs pa ma mchis so// bsam brtan kyi pha rol tu phyind par dmyigs pa ma mchis
i266a7('bum): so/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind par dmyigs pa ma mchis so// nang stong pa nyid dmyigs pa ma mchis so// phyi stong pa nyid dmigs pa ma mchis so// phyi nang stong pa nyid dmyigs pa ma mchis
i266a8('bum): so/ chen po stong pa nyid migs pa ma mchis so// don dam pa stong pa nyid dmyigs pa mchis so// 'dus na pa stong pa nyid dmyigs pa ma mchis so// 'dres ma bya ba stong pa nyid dmyigs pa
i266b1('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid du
i266b2('bum): dmyigs pa ma mchis so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid du dmyigs bye ma mchis so// rang gi mtshan nyid song pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so// myi dmyigs pa stong nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so// 
i266b3('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa'i ma mchis so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so// dran pa
i266b4('bum): nye bar gzhag pa rnams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// yang dag par spong ba rnaMs su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang rnams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// dbang po nas su dmyigs
i266b5('bum): pa ma mchis so// stobs rnam su dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnaMs su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// 'phags pa'i la mo yan lag brgyad par dmyigs pa ma mchis
i266b6('bum): 'phags pa'i bded pa rnam su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// bsam tan rnams su dmyigs pa ma mochis so// tshad myed pa rnams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// gzugs myed pa'i sbyin
i266b7('bum): bar 'jug pa nas su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// rnam par thad pa rnams su daphyogs pa ma mchis s+ho// / mthad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nam su dmyigs kyi sa so
i266b8('bum): rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smo na pa skyed par 'amyigam pa ma mchis so// / mngon pa shes pa rnams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// ting nge 'dzi
i267a1('bum): su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// gzungs kyi sgo rnamasu dmyigs pa ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnamasu dmyigs pa ma mchis so// myi 'jigs pa
i267a2('bum): dmyigs pa ma mchis so// so so yang dag par rig pa rnamasu dmigs pa ma mchis so// snying rje chen por dmyigs par ma mchis so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco' brgyad du
i267a3('bum): dmyigs su mchis// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bra bur dmyigs pa ma mchis so// le nad cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dmyigs pa ma mchis so// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur dmyigs

i267a7('bum): bu'i ngo bo nyid de la ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' brtsa lad pa ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te / byang che ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des mi
i267a8('bum): pa'i tshul du shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la yun ring por s+ya dra pas / des byang chub kyang mi dmigs na/ sangs rgyas lha rdi smais sangs rgyas kyi chos rnaMs lta ci smos
i267b1('bum): brgya byin gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyad kyi/ de ma lags pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa gzhan la myi spyod
i267b2('bum): dam bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' rtsa lad pa/ ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyind pa drug po kun la yan de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis spyod do/ 
i267b3('bum): des sbyin pa yang myi dmyigs/ rtong pa yang myi dmyigs le nad pa yang myi dmyigs so// tshul khrims yang myi dmyigs tshul khrims dang ldan pa yang myi dmyigs/ tshul

i267b6('bum): shes rab kyang myi dmyigs/ shes rab dang ldan pa yang myi dmyigs so// shes rab 'amabya ba yang myi dmyigs so// ke'u shi ka 'o nad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa

i267b8('bum): myi dmyig pa'i tshul dngo/ myig myi dmyigs pa'i tshul / rna ba myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / sna myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / lce myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / lus myi dmigs
i268a1('bum): pa'i tshul dang yid mya dmyags pa'i tshul dang // gzugs myi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / snga mi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / dri mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ro mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / reg myi dmigs pa

i268a3('bum): par shes pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa mi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'a
i268a4('bum): te reg pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa myi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yid

i268a7('bum): yid kyi lus te rig pa sas byung ba'i tshor ba myo moms pa'i sa // 'i 'jas mi darigs pa na dang / 'as myi dmyigs po'i dus dang/ 'i rnams myi phyogs mu
i268a8('bum): rung ba 'das kya dadags pa'i ma nga / sa 'i 'am gyi phyogs pa su ma shes sa sa myo dgas po dus dang / ma ga po nga dgas po
i268b1('bum): rgyags nus dang / ba shes pa rgya phyinas pa'i tshu'i dang / khyod dang gzugs myi daphyogs kyi dus dang / skye mched drug myo daphyogs ni rlub dang / ga pa myi dbyugs pa'i tshul dang / cher ba myi dmyigs de tshus dang / phred pa s+ya s+yaH/ 
i268b2('bum): do rlu dang / sen pa phyinas so m+bu dang / l+r-i pa mi daphyogs rlo mu dang / skye rdzogs pa chus dang / na myi phyogs pa'i nus dang // sbyin pa pa rol tu da pa myi myigs de rgya dang / rgya khrims kyi / 
i268b3('bum): nang pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / bzod pa'i pha ro yong tu phyin pa myi dmyigs pa tshus dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa myi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / bas gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa myi dmyigs pa tshul dang / shes
i268b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mi dmyigs pa tshul dang // nang stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi stong pa nyid myi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rnyed
i268b5('bum): stong pa nyid mi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / don de pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa tshul dang / 'dres byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid myi dmigs pa tshul dang / mtha' 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 
i268b6('bum): thog deng rnga mo meng ba stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa chub dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid myi dmigs pa'i rdul dang / chos thas cad stong pa nyid mi dmyigs pa'i rgyas dang / rang gi man nyid stong pa
i268b7('bum): cing mi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs pa deng pa nyid myi dmyigs pa tshul dngadu / dngos pa myed pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i chus dang / dngos pa myong ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyig pa'i tshub
i268b8('bum): dran pa 'i ldeg 'ag pa pa'i rgya phyogs pa'i chub dang / yang dog por snying ba pon myi dmyigs so nul dang / rdu drul gnang pa pon skye dmyigs pa'i rdul dang / bang po sa myi dmyigs pa'i chu dang / skabs sa myi daphyogs po mus
i269a1('bum): su tshulan pag su myi gas pa nub dang // gas pa sa lam sa rgyad brgya rdzogs pa chu dang // rigs pa'i rin ban myi tshugs pa rdzu / gas can phyogs pa'i rdu / 
i269a2('bum): tshad med pa pa'i mi dmyigs pa'i nus dang / gzugs myed pa'i skyes par 'jug pa bzhi myi dmigs pa'i dus dang / rna bar tha ra pa brgyad myi dmyigs pa'i chub dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma~M gyi/ 
i269a3('bum): pa'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / sngond po myed pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mngon par shes pa snga myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / ting nge 'dzin thas cad myi dmigs pa'i chu
i269a4('bum): dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad mi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mi dmyigs
i269a5('bum): bI tshul dang / snying rje chen po myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang // rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
i269a6('bum): myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / dgra btso ba nyid mi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rang byang chub myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / yi gi rnam pa shes pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rna
i269a7('bum): thos cad mkhyen pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang // chos kyis cad myi dmyigs pa'i gos byang chub sos dpa' sa dpa' chen po sbyin pa yong su gtong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rolang tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par bye ba'i sngon du 'gro ba'o// shes
i269a8('bum): kyi pha re lang du phyin pa ni byang chub ses dpa' ses dpa' chen po rdul lis kyi pha ro lang tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs pa bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa ni byang chub ses dpa' seMs dpa' chen po bzod pa yongasu smrab de rdorje/ 
i269b1('bum): pha rol tu phyi na pa yongs rdzogs pa bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu nad pa ni byang chub ses dpa' ses dpa' chen po brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa yengasu rdzogs par bya ba la sngon tu 'gro ba'o// shes
i269b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni byang chub ses dpa' ses dpa' chen po bas gtan la skyes par 'jug pa'i bas gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa yongasu rdzogs par bya ba la sngon tu 'gro ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni byang chub ses dpa' sos/

i274b5('bum): gyur to/ 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur ro// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob po/

i274b7('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'ching rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u me+e ka zug pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gangan
i274b8('bum): na'adi lta ste sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam
i275a1('bum): gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang // nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po
i275a2('bum): stong pa nyid dang / don de bstong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / theg ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyidi dang // dor ba med pa sto/ 
i275a3('bum): pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang
i275a4('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
i275a5('bum): bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang // 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang // rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyems par 'dzag pa dgu dang / rnam pa
i275a6('bum): thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drag dang / ting nge 'dzind thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
i275a7('bum): stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang // so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byis pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po da
i275a8('bum): gang snyis chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bsanang to// ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des na rig+sas kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyis rol du phyin
i275b1('bum): 'di glegs bam du byas ste/ glag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na de ni bsod nas ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rold tu
i275b2('bum): phyind pa 'di las chos thas cad rgya cher bstand te de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mthong ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnaMs yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rjes yod do// rgyal na
i275b3('bum): bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsuM gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnaMs yod do// dga' ldan gi ldan sa yod do// 'phral dga' lnga rnams yod do// gzhan 'phral dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tsha
i275b4('bum): ris kyi lha rnas yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gi lha rnaMs yod do// tshangs chen gi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad
i275b5('bum): myed snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnaMs yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// 
i275b6('bum): baM'i lha rnams yod do// chung tshu lha rnams yod do// tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// myi tshwa ba'i sgra rnams yod do// myi gdung ba'i snga rnams yod do// 
i275b7('bum): tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// reg myin gi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lnga rnams yod do/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye
i275b8('bum): mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rung bar myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod / du shes myed 'du shes myed sbyin s+ho mched kyis rnams yod // 
i276a1('bum): phar brang tu phyin pa yod do// chus khrims kyi pha rol du sbyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// badren 'grus kyi pha rol tu na pa yod de/ bsam gtan ga pa ra
i276a2('bum): du sbyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong po nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong po nyid yod do// don
i276a3('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma bas stong pa nyid do// do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
i276a4('bum): yod de/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa
i276a5('bum): stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams yod/ 
i276a6('bum): dbang po rnams yod de/ stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yid de/ bas gtan rnaMs
i276a7('bum): tshad myed pa rnams yod do// gzugs myed pa'i sems par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par dzang pa rnaMs yod do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnaMs yod do// rnam par thar pa'i
i276a8('bum): sde sbeng pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smod pa myed pa yod do// mngon par shes pa nas med ngo // nga dzid nas yod de/ bsus kyo nas yod do// de ba'i gzigs pa'i spongs nas song ngo // 'dzinapa
i276b1('bum): rnamam song dag so so yang dag par dag pa rnams yod do// stong rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod de// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// an cig tur nga ba'i 'bras bu yang / 
i276b2('bum): do phyir phyi 'ong na 'angs du yod do// dgra btso ba nyid yod ngo // rang byang chub yod do// la gyi rnam pa shes payid yong ngo // rnam pa thos cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyunang du zhugs pa rnaMs yod do// lan cig phyir 'a
i276b3('bum): rnaMs yid do// byor myi 'ong ba rnaMs yod// dgra btsob rnams yod do// nang sangs rnams yod do// byang chub ses dpa' ses dpa' chen po rnaMs yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa/ 
i276b4('bum): sangs rgyas rnaMs yod do// ke'u shi ka 'dzam bu gling gi sems can rnams lnga zhog gi/ ke'u shi ki grong bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gi khaMs kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rig kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las dge
i276b5('bum): ba btsu las kyi le la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ci snyam du sems// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mi de'i bsrid nas de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde dag
i276b6('bum): pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bya'i/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa 'di'i glegs pa klag pa 'am/ bri ba dang / kha ten bya
i276b7('bum): ba'i phyir gzhan la phyin na// bsod nas ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shaM ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di lus zag myed pa'i chos rnaMs rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs
i276b8('bum): shing rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro/ 
i277a1('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thong po 'thob par 'gyur ro// phyir myi 'o nga pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'gro'o thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid theb par gyur

i278a1('bum): lha rnams yong ngo // gas nu 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams song ngo / ngas ris kyi lha rnams song ngo // tshangs ldan pan gyi lnga rnams yong ngo // tshangs pa kun 'khor gi lha rnaMs yong do// tshangs chen tshwa

i279a1('bum): gi khams byung bu'i sos can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rig kyi bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sos// rigs kyi bu 'i rig

i279b8('bum): rje grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'i rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glagla bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha don du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin de bas 'di'i bsod nas tshes mang du 'dre'o// 
i280a1('bum): so'i phyi mer/ zhwa shi gdon 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu dra rung ba 'di las chos thas cad kyimer bsad te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rig mo zhing mtho ba rnas yod do/ bram ze'i rig mo zhing mtho' banas yod / 
i280a2('bum): khyim bdag gi rig me zhing mtho ba nas yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi wa nas yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lnga nas yod do// mtshe ma'i lha nas yod do/ dga' ldan gi lha res yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rjes yod ngo do// gzhan 'ju
i280a3('bum): dbang byed kyi lha rjes yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnas yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rjes yod do// tshangs pa kun gi lha rjes yod do// tshangs chen gi lha rjes yod do// snang ba'i lha rjes yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad myed sA
i280a4('bum): ba'i lha rjes yang ngo do// kun sdang drang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rjes yod do// chung dge'i lha rjes yod do// tshad myed dge ba'i lha rjes yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rjes yod do// tshad myed che ba'i lha rjes/ 
i280a5('bum): yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rjes yod do// myi che ba'i lha rjes yod do// myi gdung ba'i lha rjes yod do// shi nang tu mthong ba'i lha rjes yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnaMs yod// 'og myin gyi lha rnaMs yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye ched
i280a6('bum): kyi lha rjes yod do// rna shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rjes yod do// 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha rjes yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// tshul
i280a7('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin du pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa yod dog / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// mang spong pa
i280a8('bum): nyid pong do khyi stong pa nyid yong ngo // phyi nga stong pa nyid yod de/ stong nyid stong pa nyid yong / chen po spong ba'i yong / ngon ngas paspong pa 'i yong ngo / 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod / 'dus ma byas song ba'i nga yod do mjam
i280b1('bum): song do// sring mi baspong pa nyid spong ngo do// dngos po phyung ba stong pa nyid yod do// bo nyid stong pa nyid yong ngo / dngos po skyed de'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod // na pa nye bar gzhag pa rnas yod do/ yang dag par spong ba rnams
i280b2('bum): sto // rje 'phrul gi rkang ba nas yong ngo / dang po rnams song ngo// stongs nas song de/ byang chub kyi yan la gnas yong ngo // phagra pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'o // byed kra ma'i bangam pa rnas med do/ khapo dang rnam
i280b3('bum): tshad myed pa rnaMs yod do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnaMs yod do// rna bar tha rad pa rnaMs yod do// mthard kyis gan pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rjes yod do// rna bar tha rad pa'i sgong pa nyid dang / mtshan myed pa dang smond pa mye
i280b4('bum): pa yod ngo // mngon par shes pa nas yod do// ting nge 'dzin rjes yod do// gzungs kyi sgo nas yong ngo do// de bzhin gsheg pa'i spobs nas yong ngo // myi 'jig pa rnams yong ngo // so so yang dag par rig pa nas yod do// snying rje chen po long ngos
i280b5('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rjes yod do// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rna ba she pa nyid yod do// 
i280b6('bum): rna ba thas cad mkhyend pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhug pa rjes yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rjes yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba rjes yod do// dgra bcom pa rnaMs yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnaMs yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rjes yod/ 
i280b7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// // bam po nyi shu pa'o// / ke'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gi khes byar bu lta zhog gri ke'u shi
i281a1('bum): da gnyis kyi'angs rten ma khas 'thong po'i sems pa me rnyed pa dag rigs kyi rdus b+ba ga la ma ga pa cu'i las kyi lam la rang du bkod na/ ke'u shi ka do sa du sems rig kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
i281a2('bum): 'dzur nas po rgyas mang du 'phel lam// gang sa pa bcom ldan 'as ya mas so/ stan ma ldan 'das kyis pa' stsal dab/ na ga dra tu rdzogs kyi bu mo ga gas
i281a3('bum): sems kyi padam te/ de dga' bskas shi gas kyi la kyi sa ga tu'i gyi myed rnanas bya / / la gyu par gyuro// nga zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par rgya/ 
i281a4('bum): 'thob bo/ thob par 'gyuraro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thong par gyur to// 'thob po thob po 'gyuraro// phyi myo'ong ba'i 'bras bu thong bar gyur to/ 'thob po/ thob par gyur to// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ 'thob po ma
i281a5('bum): par 'gyuro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rjes kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyu ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po rjes kyang byang chub ses dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug// 
i281a6('bum): 'jug par 'gyu ro// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzog pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyaso// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyu ro// ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang grwa
i281a7('bum): zhe na 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bas gtan gi pha rol tu phyin du dang / shes rab kyi pha
i281b1('bum): byed pa dag yang slong ba nyid dag tu slong banyid dang / phyirang song pazhing dag pa cang pong khyod du po stong pa ny-id dang / ngan ma pa thong ba nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / dus ma byas tshu ma shing dgas su
i281b2('bum): 'tsha dag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i las yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'jug pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par tham pa che rgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnapa tharang pa'i sgo stong panyid nga
i281b3('bum): ma myed pa dang / ston pa skyed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting de 'i nang nas da / dUng+tha Sh+T+ri d+hA ga shegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mu~M leg pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
i281b4('bum): bco brgyad dang / byas pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dpa' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag sten/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshang myang ba gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// ke'u sha ka na~M grangs des kyang rig kyi bu 'am rigs kyi pra
i281b5('bum): mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha don du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nas ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de
i281b6('bum): ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las chos thas cad rgya cher bstanang te// de dag yod pas rgyal rig che zhing mtho ba rjes yod do// bre ze'i rig che zhing mtho ba rjes yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rjes yod do rgyal
i282a1('bum): chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rjes yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsuM gyi lha rnaMs yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnaMs yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha nas yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod
i282a2('bum): tshangs ris kyi lha rnaMs yed do// tshangs lngakye glai lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gi lha rnaMs yod do// tshangs chen gi lha rnaMs yod do// snang ba'i lha rjes yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad myed snang ba'i lha
i282a3('bum): rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnaMs yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnaMs yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnaMs yod do// chung che'i lnga
i282a4('bum): rnams yod de// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rjes yod do// myi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rjes yod do// shi nad tu mthong ba'i lha rnaMs yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rjes yod do// 'og myin gi lha rnams yod do nam
i282a5('bum): mkha'i mtha'i yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// chung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rjes yod de// 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha rjes yong ngo // 
i282a6('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yon
i282a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do 'dus
i282a8('bum): byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod ngo // thog ma dang tha myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do chos
i282b1('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
i282b2('bum): yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nas yong ngo // yang dag par spong ba nas song ngo // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnaMs yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs nas yong ngo // byang chub kyi yan ldeg rnaMs yod ngo // 'phags
i282b3('bum): lan lag brgyan pa yod do/ 'phags pa'i bang du pa nas song // ngas kyi rnarnam pa song de/ nga med pa nas song ngo // gnams myed pa'i snyoms par la gyi pa rnams song / rnam par thar pa
i282b4('bum): yod do// mthar kyis gan pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nas yod do// rna bar tha ra pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rjes yod do// ting nge 'dzin rjes yod do gzung

i282b6('bum): pa'i 'bras bu yod // lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid meng ngo // rang byang chub yod de/ lam gau rje par shes pa nyid yod do// rma pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'i
i282b7('bum): yod do// rgya nang tu zhugs pa rnaMs yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rjes yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba rjes yod do// dgra bcom pa rjes yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnaMs yod do// byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po rnaMs yod/ 
i282b8('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rjes yod do// ke'u shi ka stong gnyis pa'i 'jig rten gi khams 'bring po lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khas
i283a1('bum): tha sems cad snang pa de dag gas kyi tha' ris kyi rna mo la las dag pa su mams rab tu ko nga/ wA k+Sha da snyam du po tshigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nas de'i rgyas ma
i283a2('bum): bam dubri ba dang / thog pa dang / 'aton du byung 'i byang gzhan la byin yod sa ces kyang du 'phel lo// so phyi byen/ shi ga do 'di ltar shes rab sa pa ro lang tu phyind pa 'di las dag pa skyed pa'i chos rnam
i283a3('bum): cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am rag kyi bu ma ngag yang dag pa'i skyo myed par thug par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyuro// rgyud tu zhug pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po/ thob par 'dzun
i283a4('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob po thob pa 'gyur ro/

i283b1('bum): tu phyi nang pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa dang // nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nying dang / stong pa 'ang steng ba nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang 'dus

i284a1('bum): bang la du sa 'ang / ra / ngas 'i ldanas ri / chang byed snang
i284a2('bum): yong de kun snang dang ba'i lha nas med do// dge pa'i lha nas song ngo // rlung go'i ldanas song // chu phreng dge ba'i lha nas song ngo // dge rgyas kyi rgya rnams song ngo // che ba'i lha rnams yod // rlung che'i lha rnams yong
i284a3('bum): che ba'i lha nas yong ngo // 'bras bu me ba'i lha rnams yod do// myi che ba'i lha rnams yod ngo do// dri che ba'i lha rnams song ngo // myi gdung ba'i lha rdzas song ngo // shinang tu mthong ba'i lnga rnaMs yod do// gya rom snang ba'i lha rnam yong

i284b1('bum): stong ba nyid yod do/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod ngo // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang bla ma myed pa stong pa nyid yong ngo // ma bskyed pa stong pa nyid yod do//

i285a1('bum): pa'i drung gi byem gleng dag na sems can ji snyed cig sod pa de dag rigs kyi du'o sa kyi bu mo la las dge 'i bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu dgong na/ ke'u shig drong na du sems ris kyi bu 'o rigs kyi bu me de'i so
i285a2('bum): nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // 'de bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi kang bas kyang rig kyi bu'am rig kyi bu mo gang gA

i285a7('bum): ses dpa' chen po nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyu ra po// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyuraro// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzog pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas mngon par rdzog sa/ 
i285b1('bum): 'chang rgya 'o mngon par rdzogs par 'ang rgya bar 'gyuro// ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa dang / 
i285b2('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin du pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu nad pa dang // nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid
i285b3('bum): myi nang stong pa nyid dang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don ngam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyi dang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / 
i285b4('bum): thog ma dang tha myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thas cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa/ 
i285b5('bum): stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / byang chub
i285b6('bum): kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phag pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phag pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rna bar tha rad pa'i
i285b7('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnas dang / ting nge 'dzind rjes dang / gzungs kyi sgo rjes dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jig pa bzhi dang / 
i285b8('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btung snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tsa/ 
i286a1('bum): spyod pa gzhas dag kyang rgya mer bstan to// 'u shika dmangs ngas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rig kyi ni mo gang gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu na pa glegs pam du byis shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang kha
i286a2('bum): dubya ba'i phyi gzhan la byin na// de bas 'di'i bsod rnams ches mang du'iphem pa shes par bya'o// '-i'i byeng she na/ ke'u shi ka don 'di sa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rgyas thas
i286a3('bum): sa das tho pa sod / slo po la / khyim ba ga thobanas yong / rgyam chen pam gyis kyi rnam meng sum
i286a4('bum): gi lha nas yong ngo // mche ba'i lha nas yod ngo do// dga' ldan gi lha rjes yod ngo do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yong ngo do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lnganye phan gis
i286a5('bum): rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gi lha rnas yod de/ tshangs chen gi lha rnaMs yod do// snang ba'i lha rjes yod do// chung snang gi lha rnaMs yod do// tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnaMs yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnaMs yod do// 
i286a6('bum): dge ba'i lha rjes yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rjes yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams yod do 'bras
i286a7('bum): bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// myi che ba'i lha rnaMs yod do// myi gdung ba'i lha rjes yod do// shinang tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnaMs yod do// 'og myin gi lha rjes yod do// nam mkha'i yas skye mche
i286a8('bum): kyi lha rnams yod do// ma shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lnga rnams yod do// cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rjes yod do// 'du shes myeng 'du shes myed myin skye mched lha rnams yong ngo // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/ 
i286b1('bum): spyod do dul khrims kyi pa khyed pa spyod do// spyod pa'i pha ma du na meng // yo 'grus kyi khyo dus bye pa yod do/ sas gtad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med de/ shes rab kyapa ma
i286b2('bum): byed pa yod do// nga stong pa 'a ming do / phyi stong pa nyid spyong ngo/ byen stong banyid stong ngo / stong pa nyid spong ba nyid sod de/ chen po stong ba byed yod do/ nangs pa spong panyid yong ngo // dus byam song ba 'o / 
i286b3('bum): 'dus pa byas stong pa nyid yod do/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong / thogs rang ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor bskyed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// chos thes cang stong pa nyid yod pa
i286b4('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nas yong / 
i286b5('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rjes yod do// dbang po rjes yod do// stobs rnaMs yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rjesu yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags
i286b6('bum): pa'i bden pa rnaMs yod do// bsam gtan rnas yod do// tshad myed pa rnams yod do// gzug myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnaMs yod do// rnam par tha rad pa rnaMs yod do// mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
i286b7('bum): 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dong / mtshan myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnaMs yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo nas yod do de bzhi
i286b8('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnaMs yod do// myi 'jigs pa rjes yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyu nang tu zhung
i287a1('bum): pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig par 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yong ngo // rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yong ngo // rnam pa thos
i287a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyu nang tu zhug pa rjes yod do// ldan cig phyir 'ong ba rnaMs yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rjes yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnaMs yod do// byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa'
i287a3('bum): chen po rnas yod de// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rtog pa'i sangs rgyas rnams song ngo // ke'u shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu gling gi mAM ji snyed pa de dag rig kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu me la las bsagatan
i287a4('bum): bzha la bkod de/ tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de dzi ste du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus
i287a5('bum): mang du 'phel lam// gsolang pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka rig kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di
i287a6('bum): thegs pam du grag pa dang / khri ba dang // kha den du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na// bsod nas ches mang du 'phel lo// de tso'i phyi na na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di 'as shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa 'di las dag pa skyed pa'i chos
i287a7('bum): rgya cher bstand te/ de dag la bslabs shing rig kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur te/ 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyu ra to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur/ 
i287a8('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob po thob par 'gyur ro// 
i287b1('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnaMs kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyu ro// byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub ses rapa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to 'jug
i287b2('bum): 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzog par 'tshang bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos dag
i287b3('bum): kyang gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rolang tu phyin / 
i287b4('bum): ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang // nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 
i287b5('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha myed pa stong pa nyid dang / der ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid
i287b6('bum): stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / 
i287b7('bum): rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phag pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rno bar tha ra pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas/ 
i287b8('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rno bar tha da pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzind thas cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thas cad dang de bzhin gshegs pa
i288a1('bum): sengs su sa rgya ga pa ban dasas du da / sgru cher po dag pa 'aman pa dang pa namamam
i288a2('bum): rnamapa dang / bras pa so sa nga/ kyi yang 'a / sa kyi rnam du/ ma
i288a3('bum): lanas med / 'phrul / ba da/ so ro// mas mang / mas pa sa rnas nga/ 
i288a4('bum): tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i sgo rnams yod do// rlung sna gi wA nas stod do// da spyod bashrI lA rnaMm yong ngo // kun snang rung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ ge ba'i skarnams yod // chung ge'-i'i lha rnams yod do// chang myad dge
i288a5('bum): lha rnaMs yod do/ dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rjes yong ngo // chad myed che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rjes yod do// myi che ba'i lha nas yod do// myi gdung ba'i lha nas yong ngo // 8/ 
i288a6('bum): tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og myin gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// na shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rjes yod do// cung zad myed pa'i skye mched
i288b1('bum): nya rnams yang ngo / 'du shes myed 'du shes myed sbyin skye mched kyi lda rnams song ngo // sbyin de'i sa mang sun du bsod do// nul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yod do martson 'grus
i288b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi ba rol tu byin pa yod do// shes nab ky-i pha rolang tu gyi ri gsod ngo do// nga thong ba nyid yod // phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyin stong ba nyi ma dzang/ slong sa nyid stong pa nying mo
i288b3('bum): po stob pa nyid yong / das pa stong pa nyid yod ngo do/ 'dus byas song ba nyid yod do/ 'a/ dus pa byab spong banyid yod do/ mtha' las 'das pa srung banyid yong ngo do/ thogs dang tham myed du stong banyid pong nga/ ngor babyed pa / 
i288b4('bum): panyid yod do/ nga bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thos cad sngo pa nyid sod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// nga bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ dngos po
