i288b6('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnaMs yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad myed pa rnams yod do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par tha rad pa rnas yod/ 
i288b7('bum): ma kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nas yod do// rnam par gyud pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan myed pa dang / srid pa myed pa yod de/ mngon par shes pa rjes yod do// ting nge 'dzin nas yong ngo // gzungs kyi sgo nas
i288b8('bum): yong ngo / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nas yod ngo do// myi 'jig pa rnas yod do/ sa yang dag par rig pa nas yod do// snying rjechen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// nang du zhug pa'i 'bras bu yo
i289a1('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thos cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ 
i289a2('bum): rgyunang tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa nas yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams song ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nas
i289a3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rjes yod do// ke'u shi ka 'dzam bu gling gi sems can rjes lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gi khams kyi sems can ji snyed
i289a4('bum): yod pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de
i289a5('bum): snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ke'u shi ka
i289a6('bum): debs rigs kyi bu 'am rig kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di glegs bam du klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na ke'u
i289a7('bum): shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di las zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstanang te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to 'dun
i289a8('bum): 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo/ thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ 'thob po thob par 'gyur// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa
i289b1('bum): gyur pa to 'thob po// thob par 'gyu ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// raH/ sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rjes kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyu ro// byang chub seMs
i289b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rjes kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyu ro// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// 
i289b3('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyu ro// ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
i289b4('bum): po dang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dang // nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang phyi nang
i289b5('bum): stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das stong pa nyid dang / thog ma da
i289b6('bum): tha ma snyed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thos cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po byung ba stong pa
i289b7('bum): nyi dang do ba nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myeng ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ba'i dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdur da / 
i289b8('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa ba'i dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthur kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo song ba 'i
i290a1('bum): dan pa byed padang sa pa dang sa pa ma can dang shA pa stongs sungs ma
i290a2('bum): ngas par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pachen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' chen po dang / bang snyoms chen po dag seM// sangs rgyas kyims sud myed pa gzhanas
i290a3('bum): kya gan // ga ka rnam thas des pa gas kyi gas kyi mo gags na rab nga myed pa 'di grogs pam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / dzin du byaba'i bya
i290a4('bum): la byin na de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'dal bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las chos thos cang rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal
i290a5('bum): rigs che'ang mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum bcu ma gsum gi lha rnams song ngo mche ma'i/ 
i290a6('bum): lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gi lnga
i290a7('bum): rnams yod do// tshangs chen gi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnaMs yod/ 
i290a8('bum): tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// myi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mya gdung ba'i
i290b1('bum): lha rnams yong ngo // shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og myin gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha'i mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams
i290b2('bum): yod do cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lnga rnams yod do// 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yong ngo // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha ro/ 
i290b3('bum): tu phyind pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod
i290b4('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma myed
i290b5('bum): pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thos cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod/ 
i290b6('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// 
i290b7('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad myed pa rnams yod do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms pa
i290b8('bum): 'ag pa rnams yong ngo / rnam par da pa rnams yod do/ mngad kyis gnas pa'i sems par 'jug pa rnams yod do rnam par thad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yod do mngon par
i291a1('bum): sa mas yong du phyug gas lams ma pa nga ga par ga
i291a2('bum): snying rje chen po yong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// chu tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod ngo do/ dgra bcom pa nyid yong po
i291a3('bum): byang chub yod do// lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams
i291a4('bum): yod do/ nga sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ke'u shi ka gling chen po bzhi
i291a5('bum): pa'i 'jig rten gi khams kyi sos can rnams lta zhog gi// ke'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rig kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de// tshad myed pa bzhi
i291a6('bum): dang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol
i291a7('bum): pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalang pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du klag
i291a8('bum): pa dang bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nas ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstanang te/ 
i291b1('bum): de dag la bslabs shing rig kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu dag yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyuro// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob po// 'thob po// thob po 'gyur ro lan cig/ 
i291b2('bum): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par gyur to// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob po thob par gyur to// 
i291b3('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug
i291b4('bum): 'jug par 'gyu ro// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par satas rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyu ro// ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i
i291b5('bum): chos de dag kyang gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan
i291b6('bum): gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang // nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid rang 'dus
i291b7('bum): byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thas cad stong pa
i291b8('bum): nyid dang mi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dag phyi byags pa stong pa nyid dang / ngos pa byed pa stong bad dang khro ba nyid spong ba nyid dang dngos po myong ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye ba gzhag pa pazhi man/ 
i292a1('bum): sams kyis sa pa di sa'i gas nga can pa shes 'jug ma ma
i292a2('bum): ni thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / legs pa ban dag/ sa mas na pa ga pa ni dam pas rgyas kyi rlom ma 'das pa bco brgya dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang ma
i292a3('bum): na pa dang / pa mas chen po dag sde/ sangs rgyas kyi kyis med byed pa gzhan kya mye bsta // rnam thas ngas pa rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma
i292a4('bum): bam du bris shing klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton tu bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na// de bas 'di'i bsod nas ches mang du 'brel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka dri ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa'i/ 
i292a5('bum): las chos thams cad rgya cher bstand te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdog gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi
i292a6('bum): rnams yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha
i292a7('bum): rnams yod do// changs lha'i pan po lha rnams yod // tshangs pa kun 'khor gi lnga rnams yongad / mas nan ga lha rnams yong de/ snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung sdang gi lha rnams yong ngo // nga med sdang ba'i lha nas so rdzi/ 
i292b1('bum): sa su ngapa da sa ma smra lta ma mas nga
i292b2('bum): rnams yod do// ma mkha' mtha' las skye ma med kyi lha rnams spong / ma shes mtha' pas skye tshad kyi lha rnams song do// chung bang skyed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams song ngo // 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin gyi
i292b3('bum): kyi lha rnams yod ngo // sbyin pa'i pha rolang tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu sbyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod ngo do// bsam gtan ga pha rol
i292b4('bum): tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid do// 
i292b5('bum): do 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do chos
i292b6('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod de/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar
i292b7('bum): gzhag pa rnams song ngo // yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yong ngo // stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyang ba
i293a1('bum): yod do 'phags pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// chang myed pa rnams yod do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa rnams yod do// mtha
i293a2('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yong ngo // rnam par thad pa'i so song ba nyid dag mtshan pa myed pa dang / spyod pa byed bsod do/ mngon par shes pa rnams song / 'idzid rnams 'ong
i293a3('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod ngo do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// myi 'jigs pa rnams yid do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnas yong ngo / 
i293a4('bum): rgyunang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// la mngag phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod ngo // dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// nga byang chub yod ngo do// lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad
i293a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chu sems dpa' ses dpa' tshe
i293a6('bum): de rnams yod ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod ngo // / bam po ma gcig pa// 
i293a7('bum): ke'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gi khams kyi sems can rnams lta zhog gi na ke'u shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gi khams 'bring po'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la
i293a8('bum): bkod de tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du
i293b1('bum): 'phel lam/ gsol ba bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' stsalang pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
i293b2('bum): pa 'di glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// kle'u shi ka den 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher

i293b7('bum): zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang bas
i293b8('bum): gtan gi pha ro lang tu phyinang pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / ning stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa song ba nyid dang 'dus
i294a1('bum): rgyas stong pa'i dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa'ing dang / mthal ngan 'das pa stong panyid dang / thogs dang tha ma med pa skyong banyid dang / dor bskyed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong panyid dang / chos thas ca slong bas
i294a2('bum): nga kyim can nyid snang pa'ang dang / kyi myigs pa stong panyid dang / dngos po byed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid song pa nyid ga dngos po byung ba'i ngo bo gang stong pa nyid ngang/ dran pa nye bar gag pa ba'i dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi
i294a3('bum): yul gyin ba'i dag dbang po la dang / stobs pa dang / byang ba kyi man lag bdun dag/ 'phags pa'i mas lag zung pa dag/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thams brgyad dang / mtha kyis
i294a4('bum): pa skams par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par ldang pa'i so song bting dang / mtshan byung ba dang / spyong pa sbed ba pan mngon pa shes badrug dang/ ting nge nang thams cad dang / gzungs kyi so thams cad dang / de bzhin gshes
i294a5('bum): pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po gas
i294a6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstanang to// ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang
i294a7('bum): don du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las/ thams cad rgya che ba bstanang te de dag
i294a8('bum): song bas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim khang gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lha rnams
i294b1('bum): song ngo mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/ dga' ldan ka lha rnams yong ngo // 'phrul dga'i lha rnams song ngo // gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ga nyi phan ga lha rnams yong ngo tshangs
i294b2('bum): bkun 'khor gi lha rnams song ngo do// sa can ni lha rnams song ngo // snang ba'i lha rnams song / nga snang gi lha rnams song ngo // chad kyang snang ba'i lha rnams yong ngo // kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams song ngo / ga pa'i garnaMs nga / 
i294b3('bum): rlung dge'i lharnams yod do// nga steng dge pa'i lharnabs song ngo // gargyas kyi sngarnams spyod // 'i rnarnams song // 'i la rnams song ngo / byed pa pa'i lhanams song ngo / 'bras bu rtse pa'i lharnams yang
i294b4('bum): che ba'i lha rnams yod do// myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shi nang tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og myin gi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam
i294b5('bum): shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol/ 
i294b6('bum): tu phyind pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do phyi stong pa
i294b7('bum): nyi yod do phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don rnam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yo// 
i294b8('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid song / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod ngo do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod ngo do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod ngo do// khyi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yong do dngos po
i295a1('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid yod ngo/ ngo pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ dngos po byed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid song ngo // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongad ngo / yang dag par spong ba rnams yod // rdzu 'phrul gyi dadu po
i295a2('bum): pornams da do/ ngas dmas garnams song ngo / pa na lag rgyang bsod // 'phags pa'i na pa ma ma / khasas ga nams pa

i295a6('bum): yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yod do// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir myi 'ong
i295a7('bum): ba rnams yong ngo // dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams song ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nas
i295a8('bum): yong ngo do// ke'u shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gi khams 'bring po'i sems can rnams lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka stong gsum gi sdong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'o rigs
i295b1('bum): kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am raH/ 
i295b2('bum): kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo kheng bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
i295b3('bum): kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du'i'aphel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes
i295b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di las zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am rig kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i smosgron myed par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug pa 'gyu
i295b5('bum): rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pa to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 
i295b6('bum): 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob po / thob par gyur ro/ byang chub
i295b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
i295b8('bum): par sangs rgyaso// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul
i296a1('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gton gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi
i296a2('bum): ba dang // nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa
i296a3('bum): dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa'i
i296a4('bum): dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / 
i296a5('bum): rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad
i296a6('bum): dang mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smonang pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thos cad dang
i296a7('bum): gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams
i296a8('bum): pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhar dag kyang rgya cher bstanang to// ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang ris kyi/ 
i296b1('bum): bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa glegs bam du bris shing klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel
i296b2('bum): shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi kang ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rig che zhing mtho ba rjes yod do// bre ze'i rig cha 'ang
i296b3('bum): brjes yong ngo // khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rjes yod do// rgyal chen bzhi rnaMs kyi lha nas yod ngo do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lha rjes yod do// mche ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gi lha rnams yod ngo 'phrur
i296b4('bum): dga'i lha rjes yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rjes yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rjes yod do// tshangs lta nye phan ge lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gi lha rjes yod do// tshangs chen gi lha rjes yod do// snang ba'i lha
i296b5('bum): rnams yong ngo // chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnaMs yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rjes yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnaMs
i296b6('bum): yod do che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rjes yod do// tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// myi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// myi gdung ba'i lha rnaMs yod do// shi nad tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// 
i296b7('bum): gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og myin gi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rjes yod do// chung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes myed 'du myid myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 
i296b8('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yod ngo do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyinang pa yod do// shes rab kyi
i297a1('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyin pa stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod de/ 
i297a2('bum): 'dus mya byas stong pazhing yong ngo / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ do bsrung ba stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod // chos thams cad spong ba nyid med do/ rang gi mang
i297a3('bum): nying stong pa nyid yod do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod de/ dngos po byed pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// ngan pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag pa thos
i297a4('bum): ba rnams yod ngo do// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams yod do/ dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
i297a5('bum): yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad myed pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thard pa rnams yod do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// 
i297a6('bum): rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzind rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
i297a7('bum): yod do myi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod
i297a8('bum): bying myi 'ongadra ba'i 'bras bu yongad ngo do/ dgra bcom pa nyid yod ngo / rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// dam pa thams cad mkhyenang pa nyid yod ngo do// nunang tu zhugs pa rnams yong ngo // lan cig phyir 'ong brnaMs song/ 
i297b1('bum): phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yangag par rdzogs pa'i
i297b2('bum): sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ke'u shi ka shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sos can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de tshad myed pa
i297b3('bum): bzhi dang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang // mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ci snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam gso/ 
i297b4('bum): pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di'i glegs bam
i297b5('bum): klag pa dang bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya che
i297b6('bum): bstend te de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par
i297b7('bum): 'gyuraro lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po/ thob par 'gyur ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyu ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par
i297b8('bum): 'gyur ro// nga sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis dang byung chu thob par gyur gyi 'thob pa thob par 'gyu'o// khya chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chubasas dpa'i spyo byed pa zhugs can / 
i298a1('bum): 'jug go// 'dug par 'gyur/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs byasangs rgyam so// mngon par rdzogs par 'ang rgyaro// mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar
i298a2('bum): sa pa/ zag pa skyed pa'i chos de dag kyang yang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa pha rol tu phyirang pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rolang du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha ro lang du phyin pa dang / 
i298a3('bum): gyi ba sang du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pa ro lang du phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stang du nyid dang / phyin spong shing dang / stong banyid stong panyid dang / chen po stong panyid dang / don ngas pa srung banyid dang dus
i298a4('bum): byas stong panyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thogs dang thal skyed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba skyed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid

i298a6('bum): ngas par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lha dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa pa'i dang / rnab
i298a7('bum): thar pa brgyad dang / mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sde stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / sman pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / nga nge 'dzin thams
i298a8('bum): sa kyim / gzhanan pa ma 'i lung gi 'gas pa ma sa thos pa sas rgyas kyi mas 'al
i298b1('bum): dngadaga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// kai'u shi ka rnam dngas des kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol
i298b2('bum): hUM phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha tron du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la b+hin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir she na/ ke'u shi ka/ de ni 'di ltar shes pa
i298b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mthong ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mthong ba rnam

i298b8('bum): tha rnams yang ngo // kye nam snang ba nyi lha rnams yod do// e mrin ga lha rnams yod do// rnam mtha' mtha' yas kyi mched kyi lha rnams yangang / mi gas pa mas skye ci kyi lnga ma
i299a1('bum): yed do cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yang ngo // 'du shes mang 'du shes med min ske mched kyi lha rnams yod de// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod de// tshul khras kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa ya dang
i299a2('bum): bzod pa'i pha lang du phyinang pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha lang du phyin pa yod // shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// rang stong pa nyid yang do// phyi spang pa nyid ya

i299a4('bum): mas pa la sa myed pa dang nga dang / nga snyed pa da padang / rang bzhin pang yi na / sa ma coms ci nga // sa nyid thong cing mdang / myi daphyogs pa ska
i299a5('bum): dang / ma sa dang/ da la da da rgyada'i na mes pa // dag yo

i300a1('bum): gyuraro// rgyam zhugs sa pa pa rgya can pa/ thatha' gyu'o// khamis phyi ba'i 'das bu rdzob par byur tu/ 'ayo za du gyur 'gyur ro// phyi su 'a ba'i 'angs su rdzob par gyur

i300b7('bum): yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gi lha rnams yod do/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do

i301a2('bum): yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yid do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// myi che ba'i lha rnaMs yod//

i301a5('bum): du phyi nang pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi nang pa yod do// brtson 'khrus kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa yod do// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa yod// 
i301a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa
i301a7('bum): nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// 
i301a8('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid yid do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod de// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// 
i301b1('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs
i301b2('bum): rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad myed pa rnas
i301b3('bum): yod do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par tha rang pa rnams yod do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
i301b4('bum): dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzind rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// myi
i301b5('bum): 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lam cig
i301b6('bum): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod ngo do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yod do// 
i301b7('bum): rgyu nang du zhugs pa rnams yod do// la nad cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa'
i301b8('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams yod ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ke'u shi ka nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma
i302a1('bum): snyad kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am ri bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs meng ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga
i302a2('bum): la rab tu bkong na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod rnams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsolang ba bcom ldan 'das mang / bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / 
i302a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal du pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa 'di glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha don du bya ba'i phyir gzhan
i302a4('bum): la byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di las zag pa myong ba'i chos rnams rgya cher bstand te/ de dag la bslabs
i302a5('bum): shing rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i spyan myed par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyu rang // 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro/ 
i302a6('bum): nang cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zab par gyur / 'theb bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob par gyur
i302a7('bum): 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyu ra // 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub
i302a8('bum): sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyu rang to/ 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// 
i302b1('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rolapa tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha ro lang tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol
i302b2('bum): tu phyi nadang pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha ro ldang tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phri nang pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa dang // nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang spong ba nyid
i302b3('bum): dang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog mi dang tha ma
i302b4('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed
i302b5('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang // dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / 
i302b6('bum): stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
i302b7('bum): ba chu dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzind thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs
i302b8('bum): pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / 
i303a1('bum): btang snyems chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bsta nang ngo to// ke'u shi ka rnam grangs ngos kyang rigs kyi bu'i rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol
i303a2('bum): tu phyind pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha don du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka
i303a3('bum): ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ 
i303a4('bum): bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lha rnams yod do/ sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lnga rdzas yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gi lha rnaMs yod do// 'phrul
i303a5('bum): dga'i lha rnas yod de/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod ni/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshang lha nyaM phan gi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen chen gyi
i303a6('bum): lha rnams dang / snang ba'i lha rnaMs yod do// chung snang gi lnga rnams yod do// tshad myed snang ba'i lha rjes yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnaMs yod do// chung dga'i lha rnams yod do// 
i303a7('bum): myed dge ba'i lnga rnams yod de/ dag rgyas kyi lha rnams yod de/ che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams yod de/ 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yong ngo // myi che ba'i
i303a8('bum): lha rnams yod do// myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shi nang tu mthong ba'i lha rdzas yod do// bya rom spang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gi lha rjes yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lA rnaMs yod
i303b1('bum): rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod de// cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rdzas yod do// 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// 
i303b2('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// 
i303b3('bum): nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
i303b4('bum): yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod po/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan
i303b5('bum): stong pa nyid yod de/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag
i303b6('bum): par spong ba rnas yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden
i303b7('bum): pa rnams yod do// bsem gtan rnams yod do// tshad myed pa rnams yod do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rjes dang / rna bar tha rad pa rnams yod do// mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rjes yod// 
i303b8('bum): rna bar tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs ches
i304a1('bum): yod / myi 'jig pa mas song / seMs yang dag par rigs mas mdang/ nga rjechen po song ngo // sangs rgyas kyings ma 'dzes pa rnams med do// rgyun su zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod ngo // ma ma thas
i304a2('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ang ba'i 'bras bu yod ngo do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod ngo do// rang byang chub yod do/ mam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid yong ngo // rnam pa thams cad mi khyen pa nying yang // d+h+yan du zhugs pa ngas yod/ 
i304a3('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod ngo // phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yong ngo // dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/ rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa
i304a4('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ke'u shi ka byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las
i304a5('bum): bsam gtan ba'i la bkod pa/ tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms pacwa 'jug pa bzhi dang / gangon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod ma/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
i304a6('bum): bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'bal lam/ gsolang pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalang pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis
i304a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyi nang ba 'di glegs pas klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha don du bya ba dang gzhan la byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka don 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu
i304a8('bum): phyi nad pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstanang to// de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyo ba 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skor mang por zhugs par gyur ro// 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyuraro/ 
i304b1('bum): rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur te// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'bras bu thob par gyu rang to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyu rang // 
i304b2('bum): 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo thob par 'gyur ro// byang
i304b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par 'jug par gyu rang ngo // 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
i304b4('bum): sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyin pa dang / tshul
i304b5('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha ro lang tu phyinang pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyi nad pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyi nang po dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / 
i304b6('bum): phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /

i305a1('bum): bdun dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brkyang ba dang / 'phags pa'i bdan pa bzhi dang / rnam pa thi rang pa brgyad dang / mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa chu dang / rnam par thar du sa
i305a2('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma meng pa dang smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jig

i305a4('bum): tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstanang // ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'grog gam bris shing / glag pa dang bri ba dang / 
i305a5('bum): na du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir lam/ ke'u shi ka ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos
i305a6('bum): thams cad rgya cher bstand pa/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs tshe zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rdzas yod do// 
i305a7('bum): rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lnga rnams/ yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gau lnga rnams yod do/ mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gi lnga rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzha
i305a8('bum): 'phrul dbang byed gi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lnga rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gi lnga rnams yong ngo // tshangs pa kun 'khor gi lnga rnams yod do// tshangs chen gi lha rnams yod ngo // snang ba'i lnga rdzas yod
i305b1('bum): chung snang gi lha rdzas yod do// tshad myed snang ba'i lha rjes yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// das lha lnga rnams yod do// chung dga'i lha rnams yong ngo // tshad myang dge ba'i lha rnaMs yang
i305b2('bum): dag rgyas gi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod ngo // chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// myi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// myi gdung ba'i lha rnams
i305b3('bum): yod do// shi nang tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ gya nom snang ba'i lnga rnams yod do// 'og myin gi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lnga
i305b4('bum): rnams yod do// cung zad myang ba'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// / bam po gnyis pa'o// 
i305b5('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rolang tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rolang tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa
i305b6('bum): yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod
i305b7('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod/ 
i305b8('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// 
i306a1('bum): dran pa' bar bzhag pa pa'i ma / yang dag par spong rnams yod do/ rdzu 'phrus kyi nang pa rnams med do/ dang po rnams yod do// srabs rnams yod / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod / 
i306a2('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brkyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad myed pa rnams yod do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par
i306a3('bum): tharang pa rnams yod do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgong stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myong ba yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting
i306a4('bum): 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// myi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs
i306a5('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam/ 
i306a6('bum): rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yod do// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang
i306a7('bum): sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ke'u shi ka byang shar gi phyogs
i306a8('bum): mtshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gang na bzhi la bkod do// tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
i306b1('bum): par 'jug pa pa'i dang / mngon par shes pa lngal rab tu bkod ma/ ke'u shi ka rdo rje snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo ngani bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsalang pa bcom ldan 'das mang
i306b2('bum): bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang kha tom
i306b3('bum): du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstand te/ de dag la
i306b4('bum): bslabs shing rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon myeng bar zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo/ thob par
i306b5('bum): 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ 
i306b6('bum): 'theb bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems
i306b7('bum): dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par
i306b8('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka zag po myang ba'i chos de dag kyang gong zhem/ 'di lta ste sbyin pa'i pha ri lang tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
i307a1('bum): brtsan 'grus kyi pa ra lang du phyi nang pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol su phyi nang ba~M dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang snang pa zhid dang / phyi stong pa nying dang / byi nang srung bcad dang / stong ba
i307a2('bum): stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / rin dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / 
i307a3('bum): dar ba myang ba spong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad spong ba nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pas nyid dang / dngos po myeng pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
i307a4('bum): dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang // dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba ban dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun
i307a5('bum): dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa pa'i dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa chu dang / rnam par tha rang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / 
i307a6('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang // ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ngas so
i307a7('bum): yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang // byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed
i307a8('bum): pa dag kyang rgya cher bsta nad to// ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir
i307b1('bum): gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya
i307b2('bum): cher bstand te/ dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i
i307b3('bum): ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gi ldan gi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang
i307b4('bum): byed gi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnaMs yod do// tshangs lha nye ban gi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnaMs yod do// 
i307b5('bum): chung snang gi lha rnaMs yod do// tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// 
i307b6('bum): dge rgyas kyi lha rnaMs yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// myi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// myi gdung ba'i lha
i307b7('bum): rnams yod do// shi nang tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og myin gi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rna shes mtha' yas skye
i307b8('bum): mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin po'i pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// tshul khris kyi pha rol
i308a1('bum): du bu nang pa dang bzang ba'i pha rol tu phyi nang pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa yod do// bsam gtan gi pha rol du nad pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong de/ nang
i308a2('bum): pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod de/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa 'ang yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa
i308a3('bum): stong ba nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba myed paspong ba nyid yod/ rang bzhin spong ba 'ang yong ngo // chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid spang ba nying yod do/ myi dmyigs pa spang
i308a4('bum): nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod de/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myang ba'i ngo bo nyid spong ba nyid yod do// dran pa nye ba bzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod ngo do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rdzas
i308a5('bum): yod ngo do// dang po rnams yod de/ stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad myeng pa
i308a6('bum): rnams yod do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par tha rad pa rnams yid do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par tha rang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan mang ba
i308a7('bum): dang smon pa myed pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// myi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag
i308a8('bum): bar rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgya nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// la nad cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// 
i308b1('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid yod de/ rang byang chub yod do// lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yod de/ rgyu nang tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i
i308b2('bum): rnams yod do// dag bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chung sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
i308b3('bum): rnams yod do// ke'u shi ka shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshang
i308b4('bum): myed pa bzhi dang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus ma
i308b5('bum): du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha
i308b6('bum): rol tu phyind pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu
i308b7('bum): phyi nang pa 'di las zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstand te/ de dag la bslabs shing rags kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon myeng par zhugs par gyur te/ 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur
i308b8('bum): mang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo/ thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'grob po thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 
i309a1('bum): 'thob bo thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// zab par
i309a2('bum): 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
i309a3('bum): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzobs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka zag pa myang ba'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sbyin
i309a4('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i nga ro lang tu phyi nang pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha
i309a5('bum): rolang tu phyi nang pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po slong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid

i309a7('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong po nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang // dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang / 
i309a8('bum): dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag bcang pa dang / 'phags pa'i bangan pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms pa
i309b1('bum): 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par tha ra pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
i309b2('bum): stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po

i309b4('bum): shing klag pa dang bri ba dang / kha ton tu bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu
i309b5('bum): phyi nang pa 'di las thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnas yod do// 
i309b6('bum): rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yong ngo // gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi
i309b7('bum): lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lnga nye phan gi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gi lha rnams rnams yod do// tshangs cheni ga lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 
i309b8('bum): chung snang gi lnga rnams yod do// tshad mying snang ba'i lha rnams yod de/ kun snang dang ba'i lnga rnams yod do// dge pa'i lha rnams yod do// chung dga'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yong ngo // dge rgyas
i310a1('bum): ku sgra rnams yang nga/ cha ba'i lha rnams yang / rlung tsho rnarnams yod // chang kyang ma ba'i mas yong // rnabras bu ba lha rnams yod de// myi che ba'i snga rnams yod de// myi gdung ba'i ldanas
i310a2('bum): yang ngo // shinang su mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// mya ma snang ba'i lha rnams yo / 'os byin gi lha rnams yod do/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ rnam shes mtha' yas sgra mched kyi sa rnas
i310a3('bum): dbyung myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes myed 'du shes myang myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu
i310a4('bum): phyind pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rolang du phyind pa yod do// bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa
i310a5('bum): nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog
i310a6('bum): ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po
i310a7('bum): myang ba stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid snying pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa pa'i yod do// yang dag par spong ba rdzas yod do// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rdzas yod do// 
i310a8('bum): dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod // 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshang
i310b1('bum): myong ba rnams yang nga/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par tha rang pa rnams yod do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rdzas yod do// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang
i310b2('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzind rnaMs yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// myi 'jigs pa rnaMs yong
i310b3('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas mi 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir myi 'ong
i310b4('bum): ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam kyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yod do// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// 
i310b5('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin
i310b6('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ke'u shi ka lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag
i310b7('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji sna
i310b8('bum): du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsold pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
i311a1('bum): ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha re lang shu phyi nang pa 'di'i glegs pa ma klog pa dang / bri ba dang kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na de bas 'di'i ba sid nams ches mang du 'phel
i311a2('bum): de ci'i phyir sem/ ketsu sha ka ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyind pa 'di las zag pa myang ba'i chos rnams rgya cher bstand te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu me dag yang dag pa'i sbyor myed
i311a3('bum): bar zhugs par gyur to// 'jug ge/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// la nad cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thab pa/ 
i311a4('bum): thob par 'gyur ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zer par gyu rang // 'thob bo/ thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur // 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis
i311a5('bum): rang byang chub thob par gyur te/ 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyu rang to lu 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang
i311a6('bum): rtog par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang chu bar 'gyur ro// tsu shi ga zag pa myang du'i chos dedag kyang gang zhem/ 
i311a7('bum): 'di lta ste/ sbyin po'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa dang / brtsom 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyi nad pa dang / shes rab
i311a8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang // nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas
i311b1('bum): stong pa nyid dang mtha' las 'das pa snang bstong dang / thog ma dang tha ma myong ba stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myang pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid da
i311b2('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang // dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dge bar spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gi
i311b3('bum): nang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyang pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par tha rid pa brgyang dang / mtha ra kyis/ 
i311b4('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzind thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo
i311b5('bum): thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / khyams pa chen po dang / stong rje chen
i311b6('bum): po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstand to// ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis
i311b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha re lang tu phyi nad pa glegs bam du bris shing // klag pa dang bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes pa ru rig par bya'o// de ci'i
i311b8('bum): phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya tshor bstan to// de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rjes
i312a1('bum): yang / khyim bdag gi rigs chu 'ang mtha ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lnga rnams yong ngo // mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod de/ 
i312a2('bum): dpab ldan gi lnga rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lnga rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lnga rnams yod do// tshangs lnga nye par kyi lnga rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun
i312a3('bum): 'khor gi lha rnams yod de/ tshangs chan gi lce rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 
i312a4('bum): dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dag rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed che ba'i
i312a5('bum): lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yang do// myi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shi nang tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnas yod do// 'og myin gyi
i312a6('bum): rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched gi lha rnams yod do// cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ 'dug shes myed 'du shes
i312a7('bum): myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yod do tra tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa yang
i312a8('bum): bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod de// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do
i312b1('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// der ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod
i312b2('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed
i312b3('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod de/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan
i312b4('bum): lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod de/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad myed pa rnams yod do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod/ 
i312b5('bum): rnam par tha rad pa rnams yod de/ mthard kyis gnas pa'i sdom par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge
i312b6('bum): 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// myi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po rnams yod do// sangs rgyas kyi
i312b7('bum): chas ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yod do// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// la nad cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod de// rang byang chub yod de/ lam gi rnam pa shes pa
i312b8('bum): shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yod do// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnaMs yod
i313a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod// ga'u shi ka nub byang gi phyogs mtshams
i313a2('bum): kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung kyi bye ma skad kyi sas can ji steng pa da dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
i313a3('bum): bar 'jug pa bzhi dang mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod de/ ke'u shi ka de dzi snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das
i313a4('bum): mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di'i glegs pam klag pa dang / 
i313a5('bum): bri ba dang kha dzin du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa myeng pa'i chos rnams rgya charasam
i313a6('bum): de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyunang tu ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo thob par
i313a7('bum): 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur te/ 'thong bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur
i313a8('bum): 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgya sargyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sos
i313b1('bum): dpa'i sman myed par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// 
i313b2('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i
