i313b8('bum): ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzind thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag
i314a1('bum): par rig pa pa'i dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'das pa bcwo brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myang

i314a3('bum): bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ da bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher

i314a5('bum): yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lnga rnams yod do// dga' ldan gi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// 
i314a6('bum): tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nyi pha na gi lha rnams yod de/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lnga rdzas yod
i314a7('bum): tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lnga rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i
i314a8('bum): lnga rnams yod ngo // chung che'i lha rnams yod de/ tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ 'bras bur kro lha rnams yod do// mr-i che ba'i lha rnams yod do// myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin su mthong ba'i lha rdzas
i314b1('bum): yang / gya nam snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og myin gi lha rnams yod do// nam mtha' yos skye mched kyi lnga rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad myed pa'i
i314b2('bum): skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes myang 'du shes mya mun skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi nang pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// bzang pa'i pha rol tu

i314b6('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo na nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par
i314b7('bum): spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 
i314b8('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad myed pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par tha rad pa rnams yod do// mtha rang kyis
i315a1('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnaMs yod ngo // rnam par tha rang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myang ba yod ngo do// mngon par shes pa rdzas yang ngo // ting nge 'dzin rnams yod pa

i315a8('bum): pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / bde bar gshibs pa mang ngo / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalang pa9 'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi ba la rigs kyi tha mo gang gis shes rab ki pa'i nang kyi 'i
i315b1('bum): dam dang / bri ba dang / kha don du/ bya ba'i phyir bzhan la byed na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'be'o// de ci'i phyir zhe naH/ ka'u shi ka 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa myed pa'i chos

i316a1('bum): nyid dang / rang bzhin snang pa ting dang chas thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi ma sa pa stong ma nyis dang / dngas pa myang ba stong pa nyid dang / da btang sab pa nying dang / dngos pa myang ba'ang ba

i316a7('bum): sa thams cid rgya char stan te/ de dag ya gas cal rigs che zhing thob rnams yod de/ dram de'i rigs che zhing mtho pa rnams yod pa/ khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mthong ba rnams sod ngo // rgyal chen 'azhi'i rigs kyi snga rnam
i316a8('bum): 'dod// sum cu ma gsum gi lda rnams yod do// se ma'i tha rnams yid po dga' ldan gi lha rnams yod do// 'phras dga'i lha rnams yod / bzhan 'phrul rabang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// chang ris kyi la rnams yod
i316b1('bum): lha nya phan pa lha rnams yod de/ tshangs pa kun khor me lha rnams yod do// tshangs rkyen gi lha rnams yod den// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang pa'o
i316b2('bum): rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod de// chung dga'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rjes yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lnga
i316b3('bum): yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod dag myi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// myi rdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og myin gi lha rnams yod do// chos mkha' mtha
i316b4('bum): yos skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes myed 'du shes med myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol
i316b5('bum): zin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rolang tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyin pa
i316b6('bum): yang do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yang ngo // don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 
i316b7('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yang ngo // rab bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ rang
i316b8('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa'ang yod do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod de/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi yod
i317a1('bum): rang yang srung la ba'i yang / rdzu 'phrul pa/ gang pa rnams yang ngog/ dbang po rnams sud na mangs rnams ya // nga chug sa yan lag rnams yang / phags pa'i sman yin lem pa
i317a2('bum): pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod de/ bsam chen rnams yod do// tshad myed pa rnams yong ngo // gnanas myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thad pa rnamasam
i317a3('bum): gnas pa'i sems par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thal pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smras pa myong pa yid // mngon par shes pa rnams yod ngo do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod
i317a4('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// myi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag pa/ reg pa rnams yang ngo // snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi
i317a5('bum): ma 'dres pa rnams yod de// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yong ngo / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod de/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yong ngo // rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi
i317a6('bum): rnam pa grags pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'di yang / rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod / skan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams/ yod do// khyer myi'ang nga rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yong
i317a7('bum): rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yang ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcas pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod // ke'u shi ka
i317a8('bum): sdang gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gang klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji ska nga ta pa rigs kyi khwa 'am rigs kyi ba me la las/ bsam gang ra ba'i la bkod dang meng pa bzhi da
i317b1('bum): thugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ke de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel la
i317b2('bum): gnaladang / bcom ldan 'das mang po bde bar gshegs pa ming ngo // / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalang dang / ke'u shi ka debs rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis
i317b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu da pa gle gta mam/ klan dang / rje ba dang / mdod du bya pa'i bar stonan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'tsham lo// de ci'i phyir zhe
i317b4('bum): ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las/ zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstand te// de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag
i317b5('bum): skyer byung bar thugs par gyu da / rdzun pa/ 'dug par 'gyur ro// margyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thong par gyur te/ gyi// tha par 'gyur ro// lan gyim byar 'ong bdi 'bras
i317b6('bum): thong bar gyur te/ thing mi mang par 'gyur// phyir myi 'di ba'i 'bras bu thong pa gyur to// thong ze/ thob par 'gyur// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyurang // 'thob po// thob par 'gyur
i317b7('bum): rang byang chub thob par gyur ngo // yong // thob par 'gyuro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen blo rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur do/ 
i318a1('bum): 'jug par 'gyur/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs pa sang rgya so// mngon par rdzogs par tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par tshang rgya bar 'gyu
i318a2('bum): 'u shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyind pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i nya rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
i318a3('bum): tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / nang / stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chas
i318a4('bum): stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang mtha las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid da
i318a5('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad steng pa nga dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po byed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang
i318a6('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye ba de bzhig pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu'aphrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi
i318a7('bum): ga bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / tha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rga dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i
i318b1('bum): sgra stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang
i318b2('bum): myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / gtang snyoms
i318b3('bum): chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa bzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstanang // ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol
i318b4('bum): tu phyi nad pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / 'bri ba dang / kha don du bya ba'i phyir bzhin la byind na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel par shes par bya'o/ 
i318b5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las/ chos thams cad rgya cher bstand te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs kyi che zhing mtho ba rnams
i318b6('bum): yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lha rnams yod do// sum bcu rtsa bsum gi
i318b7('bum): rnams yod do// tshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/ dga' ldanang gi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod
i319a1('bum): rings nas kyi lha rnams yod / tshangs lnga nyi phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun la kha~M k+Shu lha rnams yod de/ tshangs chen kya lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod
i319a2('bum): d+ha snang gi lha rnams da nad myed snang ba'i rnarnams mngang/ kun snang dang pa'i lha rnams kyi dag pa'i lha rnams mngang/ rlung dga'i lha rnams yod / tshad myed dge pa'i lha rnams mang
i319a3('bum): dag rgyas kyi lha rnams yang ngo // che ba'i lha rnams yod / nu mo'i snga rnams song ngo / mang sring / rnams song / 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yid do// myi che ba'i lha rnams yong
i319a4('bum): gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shi nang tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yang / gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams 'og sbyin gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams
i319a5('bum): rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams ya r+Ne 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i
i319a6('bum): phyi nang pa yod do/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa yod brtson 'grus kyi pha rolang du phyinang pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha ro
i319a7('bum): phyi nang pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha ro lang du phyind pa yod do// nang spong ba nyid yod dang / phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ 
i319a8('bum): po stong pa nyid yod de/ don rab pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyi yod do// mtha' las 'das pa spong ba'i ba yod po thog ma dang
i319b1('bum): stong pa tad dang ngar dasad payang rang bzhin stong pa nyid yang de chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yang nga myi rnamagos pa stong pa nyid yang
i319b2('bum): kyi ngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yangadangos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod
i319b3('bum): rdzu'aphrul gi rkang pa rnams yang / dbang ba rnams yod do/ stobs rnams yod du/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ 'phags pa'i ba
i319b4('bum): rnams yod / bsam gtan rnams yod tshad myang pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyems par 'jug pa rnams yod rnam par tha rad pa rnams yod do// mthar kyis
i319b5('bum): rnas skems par 'jug pa rnams yod de rnam par tharang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid yo dang / mtshan ma myed pa smonang pa myeng ba yod / mngon par shes pa rnams yang nga / ting nge 'dzin das
i319b6('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod da / de bzhim gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yong pa/ sa myi 'jigs pa rnams yod do/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod
i319b7('bum): na po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yang // rgyu ma tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir myi 'ong
i319b8('bum): bas bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i rnams yod
